title: Liberal rationality in The Fable of the Bees. A comparison with Adam Smith and Wenceslao Fernández Flórez
affiliations: Universidad Complutense de Madrid (UCM) - Department of History of Economic Institutions I

detail.title: Liberal rationality in The Fable of the Bees. A comparison with Adam Smith and Wenceslao Fernández Flórez
detail.abstract: Mandeville, Smith, and Fernández Flórez approached economic and social problems defending liberty and at the same time acknowledging the existence of conflicts and contradictions that demand ethics, politics, and law. Their liberal rationality is not Panglossianly optimistic, neither is it cynic, and their individualism not only does not exclude society but builds upon it. They admitted the complexity of human nature and society as they really are and recognized that we would not progress economically suppressing the market, just as we would not do so morally in a fantastic universe without sins. The three stressed that institutions and rules are indispensable in communities of free and responsible people. They rejected the excesses of power and warned of the dangers of promoting ideal worlds.

AI.tldr: 曼德维尔、斯密和费尔南德斯·弗洛雷斯从自由主义角度探讨经济和社会问题，强调自由的同时承认冲突与矛盾的存在，并主张通过伦理、政治和法律来解决。他们的自由主义理性既非盲目乐观也非愤世嫉俗，其个人主义不仅不排斥社会，反而以社会为基础。他们承认人性和社会的复杂性，认为经济进步不能通过压制市场实现，道德进步也不能在无罪的幻想世界中达成。三人强调制度和规则在自由且负责任的社会中的必要性，反对权力滥用，并警告追求理想世界的危险。
AI.research_question: 自由主义如何在承认冲突与矛盾的前提下，通过伦理、政治和法律实现经济与社会的进步？
AI.motivation: 探讨自由主义思想家对经济和社会问题的独特视角，揭示其理论对现实的适用性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 自由主义理论、个人主义与社会关系、制度与规则的作用。
AI.method: 文献分析与理论探讨。
AI.findings: 自由主义需通过制度和规则平衡自由与责任，承认人性和社会的复杂性是实现进步的关键。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了自由主义理论，强调社会基础与制度的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为现实中的政策制定和社会治理提供了理论支持，警示理想化治理的危险。

title: Food Security as an Element of Social and Economic Security in Bulgaria
affiliations: Trakia University, Trakia University and Kaneff University Hospital

detail.title: Food Security as an Element of Social and Economic Security in Bulgaria

declarations.declarationOfInterest: not applicable
declarations.funderStatement: not applicable

detail.abstract: The use of unmanned aerial vehicles for monitoring agricultural crops, assisting in land reclamation, effective herd control, land inventory, controlling the parameters of agro-technological processes, spraying chemicals, guarding facilities, etc. is already a practice in a number of countries. Constant full monitoring of the conditions for carrying out agricultural processes, the dynamics of changes in the state of agricultural lands, and the characteristics of technological processes using technical means for real-time monitoring is the most important prerequisite for the implementation of highly productive and effective agricultural technologies. The expert method of hierarchical analysis can be used to substantiate groups of factors and the system of food security indicators. Based on the obtained system of indicators, the structure, relationships, and membership functions of fuzzy cognitive maps are formed. For parameterization of cognitive maps, the construction of infological and information models is used, providing justification for the structure of the relational database for the analyzed statistical indicators. We have constructed and tested a family of predictive econometric models based on private indicators for food product groups. Methods for integrating the obtained econometric models into a cognitive map have been developed based on membership functions and fuzzy logic. To support numerical studies and scenario analyses, the methodology of developed cognitive maps is used, a software complex is required. Such a software complex includes a computer program, a knowledge base for building membership functions for factors, and a statistical database for conducting research based on the use of an intelligent system for assessing and forecasting the integral level of food security.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了无人机在农业监测中的应用，并结合层次分析法和模糊认知地图，构建了食品安全的预测模型和智能评估系统。
AI.research_question: 如何利用无人机和智能系统技术提升农业监测和食品安全的预测能力？
AI.motivation: 农业监测和食品安全的实时动态管理是高效农业技术的重要前提，需要结合现代技术手段实现精准预测和评估。
AI.theoretical_framework: 层次分析法、模糊认知地图、模糊逻辑、预测计量经济学模型。
AI.method: 构建模糊认知地图和预测模型，开发软件系统支持数值研究和情景分析。
AI.findings: 成功构建了基于模糊逻辑的预测模型和智能评估系统，支持食品安全的动态监测和预测。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了结合无人机技术和模糊认知地图的食品安全评估新方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 开发了支持农业监测和食品安全预测的软件系统，为实际应用提供了工具。

title: Climate-Induced Inflation in West Africa: A Regional Panel Perspective on Food Security
affiliations: Central Bank of Nigeria, affiliation not provided to SSRN and Central Bank of Nigeria

detail.title: Climate-Induced Inflation in West Africa: A Regional Panel Perspective on Food Security
detail.abstract: Rising food inflation poses a serious threat to food security and poverty reduction efforts across West Africa. This study investigates the extent to which climate anomalies, particularly temperature and oil price shocks, influence food price dynamics in West Africa. Employing Dynamic Panel Analysis on a panel dataset of 16 West African countries from 1983 to 2023. The analysis reveals that temperature anomalies have a statistically significant and positive effect on food inflation, with stronger effects observed in Sahelian economies compared to Coastal counterparts. The findings underscore the vulnerability of food systems to climatic variability, particularly in rain-fed agricultural zones. Oil price fluctuations, a proxy for input and transport costs, also contribute significantly to inflationary pressures. Robustness checks using static panel models reaffirm the central role of climate-induced shocks in driving food price volatility. These results highlight the urgency of integrating climate adaptation into agricultural and industrial policy design. Policies that promote climate-smart agriculture, regional food value chains, and resilience-focused investment in rural infrastructure are essential for safeguarding food security and macroeconomic stability in West Africa.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了气候异常（特别是温度和油价冲击）对西非食品价格动态的影响，发现温度异常显著推高食品通胀，且萨赫勒地区比沿海地区更敏感。油价波动也加剧通胀。研究呼吁将气候适应纳入农业和工业政策。
AI.research_question: 气候异常（温度和油价冲击）如何影响西非的食品价格动态？
AI.motivation: 食品通胀威胁西非的粮食安全和减贫努力，需探究气候因素的作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 动态面板分析，气候经济学，食品价格波动理论。
AI.method: 对1983-2023年16个西非国家的面板数据进行动态面板分析。
AI.findings: 温度异常显著推高食品通胀，萨赫勒地区更敏感；油价波动也是通胀主因。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证气候异常对食品价格的直接影响，补充气候经济学的实证证据。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议将气候适应纳入政策，推广气候智能农业和区域食品价值链。

title: Promoting Pension Participation: Evidence on Attention and Personalization from Two Field Experiments
affiliations: Renming University, Peking University, The University of Hong Kong - Faculty of Business and Economics, Peking University - Guanghua School of Management and Peking University - Guanghua School of Management

detail.title: Promoting Pension Participation: Evidence on Attention and Personalization from Two Field Experiments
detail.abstract: We collaborate with a bank to conduct two large-scale field experiments promoting China's newly launched Personal Pension Program through automated calls. Financial interventions emphasizing tax benefits and compound interest outperform the industry-standard bonus in both listening and browsing by about 30%, while behavioral nudges addressing time misperception, bequest motives, and procrastination yield smaller but still significant gains. Dynamic patterns provide novel field evidence of an attention-memory-action process triggered by time-sensitive cues, underscoring the importance of evaluating nudge effects beyond immediate reactions. Algorithmically tailored scripts increase listening by 6.2% and browsing by 17.4%, highlighting the value of personalized nudges.

AI.tldr: 本文通过与银行合作进行两项大规模实地实验，研究如何通过自动电话推广中国新推出的个人养老金计划。研究发现，强调税收优惠和复利的财务干预效果优于行业标准的奖金激励，收听和浏览率提高约30%；而针对时间感知偏差、遗产动机和拖延行为的行为干预效果较小但仍显著。动态模式揭示了时间敏感线索触发的注意力-记忆-行动过程，强调了评估行为干预效果时需超越即时反应。算法定制的脚本使收听率提高6.2%，浏览率提高17.4%，突显了个性化干预的价值。
AI.research_question: 如何通过财务和行为干预有效推广中国个人养老金计划？
AI.motivation: 研究旨在探索财务和行为干预在推广个人养老金计划中的效果，为政策制定和金融实践提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究基于行为经济学理论，特别是时间感知偏差、遗产动机和拖延行为对决策的影响。
AI.method: 采用两项大规模实地实验，通过自动电话推广个人养老金计划，比较财务干预和行为干预的效果。
AI.findings: 财务干预（税收优惠和复利）效果优于行业标准奖金激励，收听和浏览率提高约30%；行为干预效果较小但仍显著。算法定制脚本显著提升收听和浏览率。
AI.theory_contributions: 提供了时间敏感线索触发的注意力-记忆-行动过程的实证证据，丰富了行为经济学理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为金融机构和政策制定者提供了推广养老金计划的有效干预策略，强调了个性化干预的重要性。

title: Automated Bayesian Operational Modal Analysis Using Modal Invariant Subspace of Power Spectrum
affiliations: Sichuan University, Sichuan University, Sichuan University and Hawassa University

detail.title: Automated Bayesian Operational Modal Analysis Using Modal Invariant Subspace of Power Spectrum
detail.abstract: Bayesian operational modal analysis (OMA) can provide both the most probable values (MPVs) of modal parameters and their uncertainties that are quite useful for the further stages in structural control and health monitoring. For the class of Bayesian frequency-domain OMA, the initial step before the actual modal identification is the mode-picking process which involves the determination of a resonant frequency band and the number of the dominating modes therein. However, the mode-picking process in conventional Bayesian frequency-domain OMA is usually operated manually, leading to the issue of subjectiveness and another source of uncertainty. In this study, the mode-picking process is automated based on the property of modal invariant subspace inherent in the power spectral density (PSD) of ambient vibration data within a resonant frequency band. Modal correlation matrix between the subspaces of the estimated PSD at different frequency points is further constructed for the purpose of extracting the resonant frequency band and determining the number of dominating modes therein. The automation of the mode-picking process is specifically achieved by converting the modal correlation matrix into a binary matrix and then adopting the mathematical morphology operation and the Moore-Neighbor tracing algorithm. The proposed method is demonstrated with a simulated 4-DOF mass-spring-damper structure, a 3-story laboratory shear-frame structure and a practical bell tower engineering structure. Results show that it can achieve automation quite well with satisfactory modal identification results, even for the case with closely-spaced modes.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种自动化模态选择方法，用于贝叶斯频域操作模态分析，解决了传统手动方法的主观性和不确定性问题。
AI.research_question: 如何自动化贝叶斯频域操作模态分析中的模态选择过程？
AI.motivation: 传统贝叶斯频域操作模态分析中的模态选择过程依赖人工操作，导致主观性和额外的不确定性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于环境振动数据的功率谱密度（PSD）中的模态不变子空间特性。
AI.method: 通过构建模态相关矩阵，将其转换为二进制矩阵，并采用数学形态学操作和Moore-Neighbor追踪算法实现自动化。
AI.findings: 方法在模拟和实际结构中表现良好，能够有效识别模态，包括密集模态情况。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种基于模态不变子空间的自动化模态选择理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为结构控制和健康监测提供了更可靠的模态参数和不确定性估计。

title: What Prevents Rural Populations from Evacuating Early? Socioeconomic Determinants in the Context of Floods Caused by Tropical Storm Ana in Mozambique
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN and Kansai University

detail.title: What Prevents Rural Populations from Evacuating Early? Socioeconomic Determinants in the Context of Floods Caused by Tropical Storm Ana in Mozambique
detail.abstract: This study examined the socioeconomic factors that influenced evacuation decisions during the 2022 floods induced by Tropical Storm Ana in Mozambique’s Licungo River Basin. Using a quantitative approach involving 300 households, this study investigated the impact of education level and literacy, financial affluence, land ownership, and social capital on evacuation timing. The findings revealed that while financial affluence and secure land tenure encourage early evacuation, education level and literacy have no effects, contrary to the existing literature. Furthermore, bridging and linking social capital were found to delay evacuation, suggesting that individuals delay action while awaiting a collective consensus. Based on the findings, this study proposes adding “incentives” as the fifth pillar of the Early Warning framework initiated by the United Nations. It also recommends tailored DRR education, financial incentives, and the development of a DRR culture that integrates disaster preparedness into community norms.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了2022年热带风暴安娜引发的莫桑比克利昆戈河流域洪水期间，社会经济因素对疏散决策的影响。通过300户家庭的定量分析，发现财务富裕和土地所有权促进早期疏散，而教育水平和识字率无影响，社会资本则延迟疏散。
AI.research_question: 社会经济因素如何影响洪水期间的疏散决策？
AI.motivation: 了解疏散决策的影响因素，以改进灾害风险管理策略。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于社会经济因素（教育、财务、土地所有权、社会资本）与疏散行为的关系。
AI.method: 定量研究，调查300户家庭。
AI.findings: 财务富裕和土地所有权促进早期疏散；教育无影响；社会资本延迟疏散。
AI.theory_contributions: 挑战了教育对疏散行为影响的传统观点，提出社会资本的双重作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议将“激励”纳入早期预警框架，并提出定制化灾害风险减少教育和财务激励措施。

title: Time in International Human Resource Management: A Systematic Review and Agenda for Future Research
affiliations: Sunway University, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Time in International Human Resource Management: A Systematic Review and Agenda for Future Research
detail.abstract: Time is conceptualized, perceived, and valued differently across individuals and contexts. This study reviews articles from leading HRM and management journals—including Human Resource Management, The International Journal of Human Resource Management, and Human Resource Management Journal—to examine how time has been integrated into HRM research, with a focus on international HRM (IHRM). We foreground both objective time (e.g., clock time) and subjective time (e.g., temporal perceptions), highlighting their influence on various outcomes. Our analysis identifies four temporal lenses—time as duration, rhythms, philosophy, and resources/constraints—that capture the integrative nature of time by addressing its conceptual (objective vs. subjective) and functional roles in shaping IHRM practices. Our holistic framework offers a foundation for future international and comparative HRM research, providing valuable theoretical and practical implications for firms and employees. It also emphasizes the importance of human-centric temporal perspectives in the context of an increasingly globalized business environment

AI.tldr: 本文回顾了人力资源管理（HRM）和国际人力资源管理（IHRM）领域中对时间概念的研究，提出了四种时间视角，并探讨了其对IHRM实践的影响。
AI.research_question: 时间如何被整合到HRM研究中，尤其是在国际HRM（IHRM）背景下？
AI.motivation: 时间在不同个体和情境中被概念化、感知和评价的方式不同，但其在HRM研究中的作用尚未被充分探讨。
AI.theoretical_framework: 提出了四种时间视角：时间作为持续时间、节奏、哲学和资源/约束。
AI.method: 回顾了来自主要HRM和管理期刊的文章。
AI.findings: 时间在IHRM中具有概念性和功能性作用，影响实践和结果。
AI.theory_contributions: 为国际和比较HRM研究提供了理论基础，强调了人本主义时间视角的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业提供了在全球化背景下优化时间管理的实践建议。

title: Study on Thermo-Hydraulic Characteristics of Porous Sandstone Using Infrared Non-Destructive Testing and Neural Network Prediction Model
affiliations: University of Shanghai for Science and Technology, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, University of Shanghai for Science and Technology, University of Shanghai for Science and Technology, affiliation not provided to SSRN and Shanghai University

detail.title: Study on Thermo-Hydraulic Characteristics of Porous Sandstone Using Infrared Non-Destructive Testing and Neural Network Prediction Model
detail.abstract: This study employed the temperature gradient method to analyze the temperature distribution characteristics of water-absorbing sandstone, enabling refined characterization of thermo-hydraulic transfer at the microscale and real-time monitoring of its dynamic evolution. It revealed a linear correlation (R² = 0.95) between water absorption time and the height position of the extremum point in the temperature gradient. Utilizing nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) technology, volumetric water content profiles at different times and heights were normalized against the benchmark value at vacuum-saturated state, generating normalized water saturation profiles. A linear relationship (R² = 0.91) was also found between water absorption time and the height position of the extremum point in the rate of change of the normalized water saturation profile. A novel linear correlation model (R² = 0.98) was established between the temperature gradient extremum point and the extremum point in the rate of change of the normalized water saturation profile. Based on in-situ temperature data acquired via infrared thermography (IRT), the extremum point of the water saturation profile can be accurately inferred. Furthermore, a neural network prediction model was proposed to reconstruct the water content distribution at arbitrary times and different height positions using discrete water content data from limited time points. Model predictions showed excellent agreement with NMR results (average error <5%, maximum error <15%). This work provides innovative approaches for quantitative thermo-hydraulic characterization and in-situ water content detection in stone relics.

AI.tldr: 本研究采用温度梯度法和核磁共振技术，分析了吸水砂岩的温度分布特征，建立了温度梯度极值点与归一化水饱和度变化率极值点之间的线性关系模型，并提出了神经网络预测模型，为石质文物的热-水力定量表征和原位含水量检测提供了创新方法。
AI.research_question: 如何通过温度梯度法和核磁共振技术定量表征吸水砂岩的热-水力传输特性，并实现原位含水量检测？
AI.motivation: 石质文物的保护需要精确的热-水力特性表征和含水量检测方法，现有技术难以满足微观尺度和动态演化的需求。
AI.theoretical_framework: 温度梯度法、核磁共振技术、归一化水饱和度分析、神经网络预测模型。
AI.method: 采用温度梯度法分析温度分布，核磁共振技术生成归一化水饱和度剖面，建立线性关系模型，并提出神经网络预测模型。
AI.findings: 发现吸水时间与温度梯度极值点高度位置（R²=0.95）及归一化水饱和度变化率极值点高度位置（R²=0.91）的线性关系，建立了两者之间的线性模型（R²=0.98），神经网络预测模型误差低于15%。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了温度梯度极值点与归一化水饱和度变化率极值点之间的线性关系模型，丰富了热-水力传输理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为石质文物的热-水力定量表征和原位含水量检测提供了创新方法，具有实际应用价值。

title: Managerial Liability and the Principle of Effectiveness Go to Luxembourg: A Preliminary Assessment of a Preliminary Reference
affiliations: Helmut Schmidt University / University of the Armed Forces Hamburg

detail.title: Managerial Liability and the Principle of Effectiveness Go to Luxembourg: A Preliminary Assessment of a Preliminary Reference

declarations.declarationOfInterest: None
declarations.funderStatement: None

detail.abstract: The German Federal Court of Justice has made a preliminary reference to the CJEU on the question whether a company may claim compensation from a culpable manager for corporate fines imposed on the company by antitrust authorities. Such indemnification for, or recovery of, the corporate fine reduces the economic burden on the undertaking and therefore conflicts with the principle of effectiveness under EU law, which requires fines on the undertaking not only to be proportionate but also dissuasive and deterrent. Proponents of indemnification and recovery argue that the reduction of deterrence on the company is compensated by the increase in deterrence on individuals. This article explains that this is not the case, inter alia, because of the presence of D&O insurance. In the case before the referring court, if recovery of the corporate fine were allowed, the D&O insurer would pay the entirety of the corporate fine and likely all third-party damages, possibly even allowing the company to retain the cartel profits; the D&O insurer's liability has already been determined by a final court judgment, and the coverage limits far exceed the corporate fine and likely third-party damages claims. Accordingly, neither the company nor the manager would bear any economic burden for their intentional cartel participation, a result that clearly contradicts the principle of effectiveness.

AI.tldr: 德国联邦法院向欧盟法院提出初步问题，询问公司是否可以向有过错的管理者索赔因反垄断机构对公司处以的罚款。这种索赔或追偿会减轻企业的经济负担，与欧盟法律中的有效性原则相冲突。支持者认为对个人的威慑增加可以弥补对公司威慑的减少，但本文指出由于董事责任保险的存在，这种补偿并不成立。
AI.research_question: 公司是否可以向有过错的管理者索赔因反垄断机构对公司处以的罚款？
AI.motivation: 探讨索赔或追偿公司罚款对欧盟法律中有效性原则的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 欧盟法律中的有效性原则（罚款需具有威慑性和劝阻性）。
AI.method: 法律分析和案例研究。
AI.findings: 由于董事责任保险的存在，索赔或追偿会导致公司和经理无需承担任何经济负担，违背有效性原则。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了董事责任保险在反垄断罚款追偿中的潜在问题。
AI.practical_contributions: 为立法和司法实践提供了关于反垄断罚款追偿的警示。

title: The European Court of Human Rights and Intellectual Property: Still Waiting for the New Innovation Frontier?
affiliations: University of Amsterdam - Institute for Information Law (IViR)

detail.title: The European Court of Human Rights and Intellectual Property: Still Waiting for the New Innovation Frontier?
detail.abstract: This article explores the influence of the European Court of Human Rights (ECtHR) on intellectual property (IP) law through human rights methodologies. While Professor Laurence Helfer, in his seminal article published in 2008, identified the ECtHR as an emerging innovation frontier in Europe, the extent to which this prediction has come to fruition might seem debatable. Notably, the jurisprudence of the Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU), rather than that of the ECtHR, has largely dominated discussions on the intersection of IP and human rights in Europe. As such, this article seeks to analyse the ECtHR’s contribution to – and its actual impact on – the human rights-based adjudication of IP issues. After a short introduction (I), it begins by examining the possible reasons behind the relative obscurity of ECtHR decisions in the European IP law discourse (II). It then focuses on the Strasbourg Court’s contribution to the development of human rights-based IP adjudication, demonstrating that, despite the limited engagement of IP community with the ECtHR, its jurisprudence has played, and continues to play, a pivotal role in shaping European IP law norms (III). This influence is assessed by first exploring the ECtHR-developed approaches to resolving conflicts between IP protection and freedom of expression (III.1), followed by an examination of the Court’s recognition of IP rights as an integral part of the broader human right to property – an area that has seen considerable expansion, particularly in recent years (III.2). Based on this analysis, the article concludes that we are certainly not waiting anymore for the ECtHR to become a new innovation frontier – it has already become one, having formed itself as a significant, albeit often underappreciated, force in the European IP legal landscape, operating quietly but far more meaningfully than is commonly recognised (IV).

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了欧洲人权法院（ECtHR）通过人权方法对知识产权法的影响。尽管Laurence Helfer教授在2008年的文章中预测ECtHR将成为欧洲的创新前沿，但其实际影响仍有争议。本文分析了ECtHR在基于人权的知识产权裁决中的贡献和实际影响，并认为其已成为欧洲知识产权法律格局中的重要力量。

AI.motivation: 尽管ECtHR的判例在欧洲知识产权法讨论中相对边缘化，但其对知识产权与人权交叉领域的影响值得深入研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本文基于人权法与知识产权法的交叉理论，探讨ECtHR的判例如何影响欧洲知识产权法的发展。
AI.method: 通过分析ECtHR的判例，特别是其在知识产权保护与言论自由冲突中的裁决，以及将知识产权视为财产权的扩展，评估其影响。

title: The Next Accounting Frontier: Bringing Structure and Reliability to Nlp
affiliations: New York University, Bridgeway Capital Management and Bucknell University Freeman College of Management

detail.title: The Next Accounting Frontier: Bringing Structure and Reliability to Nlp
detail.abstract: Global investors navigate vast amounts of qualitative information, which differs significantly across various disclosure regimes. Our study uses a unique database that adopts a structured approach to natural language processing (NLP) analysis following a centuries-tested approach of classifying and presenting quantitative information in financial statements. The database provides extractions of qualitative information about  the income statement, balance sheet, and other financially relevant items. We provide two examples of how investors can utilize this database to create signals that yield favorable results, one for the ACWII IMI universe and one for the domestic US market. These signals also exhibit reasonably low correlations with other investment factors, providing further evidence about the complementary nature of qualitative information.  Our study provides evidence that a reliable and repeatable NLP extraction process can offer meaningful insights to investors, bridging the gap between unstructured qualitative information and structured financial reports.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过结构化自然语言处理（NLP）方法，从全球投资者的定性信息中提取有用信号，展示了如何利用这些信号在投资中取得优势。
AI.research_question: 如何通过结构化NLP方法从定性信息中提取有用的投资信号？
AI.motivation: 全球投资者面临大量定性信息，且不同披露制度下信息差异显著，需要一种可靠的方法提取有用信号。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于结构化NLP方法，借鉴财务报表分类和呈现定量信息的传统方法。
AI.method: 使用独特的数据库，通过结构化NLP分析提取收入表、资产负债表等财务相关项目的定性信息。
AI.findings: 研究提供了两个成功案例，展示了如何利用提取的信号在ACWII IMI和美股市场中获得优势，且这些信号与其他投资因子相关性较低。
AI.theory_contributions: 证明了结构化NLP方法可以从定性信息中提取有价值的投资信号，填补了非结构化信息与结构化财务报告之间的鸿沟。
AI.practical_contributions: 为投资者提供了一种可靠且可重复的工具，帮助其从定性信息中获取有意义的投资洞察。

title: FloodSentia: An AI Driven Flood Mapping System Using Dual Satellite Imagery
affiliations: Rashtreeya Vidyalaya College of Engineering (RVCE) and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: FloodSentia: An AI Driven Flood Mapping System Using Dual Satellite Imagery
detail.abstract: Flood detection using satellite imagery remains challenging due to frequent cloud cover and inconsistent data availability. This paper presents an automated system that integrates Sentinel-1 synthetic aperture radar (SAR) and Sentinel-2 optical data through a cloud-aware selection mechanism that identifies the most appropriate imagery source based on prevailing atmospheric conditions. A custom CloudAnalyzer module computes quality scores for each satellite dataset by weighting factors such as cloud cover, data availability, and temporal proximity, defaulting to SAR when optical data is obstructed. The selected imagery is processed using pre-trained models Microsoft AI4Flood, IBM Prithvi, or an ensemble without additional fine-tuning. Model selection is adaptive: Sentinel-2 paired with Prithvi is used under clear skies, while high cloud presence triggers a switch to Sentinel-1 with AI4Flood. A large language model enables natural language interaction by referencing detection outputs, cloud assessments, and real-time environmental data. To improve reliability, system outputs are validated against rainfall measurements, current weather alerts, and historical flood records. The system continuously ingests new data with minimal delay, enabling rapid and reliable flood assessment with minimal manual intervention. By adapting to real-time atmospheric conditions, the system delivers consistent flood assessments using the most suitable satellite data available.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种自动化系统，通过整合Sentinel-1 SAR和Sentinel-2光学数据，结合云感知选择机制，实现洪水检测。系统根据大气条件选择最佳数据源，并使用预训练模型处理图像，同时通过自然语言交互和实时数据验证提高可靠性。
AI.research_question: 如何利用卫星数据在云覆盖和不一致数据可用性的情况下实现可靠的洪水检测？
AI.motivation: 洪水检测因云覆盖和数据可用性问题而具有挑战性，需要一种自适应系统来优化数据选择和模型应用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 结合合成孔径雷达（SAR）和光学数据的互补优势，利用云感知机制和预训练模型进行洪水检测。
AI.method: 系统通过CloudAnalyzer模块评估数据质量，自适应选择Sentinel-1或Sentinel-2数据，并使用预训练模型（如AI4Flood或Prithvi）处理图像。
AI.findings: 系统能够根据实时大气条件选择最佳数据源，并通过自然语言交互和实时验证提高洪水检测的可靠性。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种结合SAR和光学数据的自适应洪水检测框架，扩展了多源卫星数据融合的理论应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 开发了一种无需人工干预的自动化洪水检测系统，可快速响应并提供可靠的洪水评估。

title: Supreme Audit Institutions and the Fight Against Corruption: A Critical Assessment of Intosai's Standards Framework
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, Institute of Public Affairs and Copenhagen Business School - Department of Accounting

detail.title: Supreme Audit Institutions and the Fight Against Corruption: A Critical Assessment of Intosai's Standards Framework
detail.abstract: The article investigates the role of Supreme Audit Institutions (SAIs) in fighting corruption through the standards initiative of the International Organization of Supreme Audit Institutions (INTOSAI). As the global standard-setter for public sector auditing, INTOSAI plays a pivotal role in shaping the methodologies and practices of SAIs across nations. Its frameworks and guidelines offer a shared foundation for transparency, accountability, and integrity in the management of public resources—key pillars in anti-corruption strategies. The results presented in this section are based on a combination of content analysis of official INTOSAI documents and qualitative data gathered through expert interviews with auditors and public governance specialists.The article concludes that this initiative is a step in the right direction but critically evaluates it. Despite INTOSAI’s significant global reach and potential for impact, the proposed audit criteria are developed contrary to basic audit theory. This misalignment raises concerns about the effectiveness and coherence of the anti-corruption frameworks currently in place. Therefore, the article calls for clarity and due reform of the INTOSAI standards-setting process to enhance its legitimacy, credibility, and practical relevance in combating corruption worldwide.

AI.tldr: 文章探讨了最高审计机构（SAIs）通过国际最高审计机构组织（INTOSAI）的标准倡议在反腐败中的作用，指出其框架虽具潜力，但标准制定与基本审计理论不符，需改革以提高有效性。
AI.research_question: 最高审计机构（SAIs）如何通过INTOSAI的标准倡议在反腐败中发挥作用？
AI.motivation: INTOSAI作为公共部门审计的全球标准制定者，其框架对透明度和反腐败至关重要，但现行标准与审计理论存在偏差，需评估和改进。
AI.theoretical_framework: 公共部门审计理论、反腐败策略、透明度和问责制。
AI.method: 内容分析（INTOSAI官方文件）和定性数据（专家访谈）。
AI.findings: INTOSAI倡议方向正确，但标准制定与审计理论不符，影响反腐败框架的有效性。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了INTOSAI标准与审计理论的偏差，呼吁理论一致性。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议改革INTOSAI标准制定流程，以增强其在全球反腐败中的合法性和实用性。

title: Modelling Material Recovery from End-of-Life Electric Vehicle Batteries in Australia to 2050
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, University of Technology Sydney (UTS) and University of Technology Sydney (UTS) - Institute for Sustainable Futures

detail.title: Modelling Material Recovery from End-of-Life Electric Vehicle Batteries in Australia to 2050

keywords.keywords: Material Flow Analysis: Waste Management: Waste Generation: Circular Economy: Lithium-ion Batteries: Electric Vehicles: Resource Recovery

detail.abstract: The rise in electric vehicle (EV) adoption in Australia presents a waste management challenge, considering the current lack of a mature lithium-ion battery recycling industry. This study developed a material flow model to evaluate future scenarios impacting battery waste volumes and recovery potential from cathode material on an annual basis to 2050. The modelling suggests annual waste volumes of spent lithium-ion batteries from EVs could range between 500,000 and 900,000 tonnes by 2050 depending on EV market projection trajectories. Our analysis shows how future changes in battery chemistry, size, expected lifetimes, and recycling efficiency can significantly affect the potential value of recovered materials. One of the most significant variables is recycling efficiency has the potential to increase the total mass of recovered materials by 205.5%. The results of this study can be used by stakeholders to further policymaking and inform future investment in recycling infrastructure.

AI.tldr: 本文通过建立材料流动模型，评估了澳大利亚电动汽车（EV）锂离子电池的未来废弃物量及回收潜力，预测到2050年废弃物量可能达50万至90万吨，并分析了电池化学、尺寸、寿命及回收效率对回收材料价值的影响。
AI.research_question: 澳大利亚电动汽车锂离子电池的未来废弃物量及回收潜力如何？
AI.motivation: 电动汽车在澳大利亚的普及带来了锂离子电池废弃物管理的挑战，目前缺乏成熟的回收产业。
AI.theoretical_framework: 材料流动模型。
AI.method: 开发材料流动模型，评估未来情景对电池废弃物量及回收潜力的影响。
AI.findings: 到2050年，电动汽车锂离子电池废弃物量可能达50万至90万吨；回收效率是影响回收材料价值的关键变量，可提升205.5%的回收材料总量。
AI.theory_contributions: 为锂离子电池废弃物管理提供了理论模型和分析框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 研究结果可为政策制定和回收基础设施投资提供依据。

title: “Bad Rebounds” and the Environment: Bottled Water and Plastic Collection Behavior Using Cross-Sectional Italian Data
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, University of Naples Parthenope and University of Naples Parthenope - Department of Economic Studies (DES)

detail.title: “Bad Rebounds” and the Environment: Bottled Water and Plastic Collection Behavior Using Cross-Sectional Italian Data
detail.abstract: The multidimensional nature of environmental problems is increasingly recognized, as different relevant behaviors may be mutually reinforcing or in a trade-off relationship. This is particularly relevant when the use of resources is tightly linked to their packaging, as in the case of bottled water consumption.This paper aims at using Italian data to assess whether plastic related separated collection and bottled water consumption are complements or substitutes in consumers’ behaviors. Using Cross-sectional Italian data, we provide evidence of a challenging “rebound” effect: individuals more engaged in recycling are also those producing more plastic waste related to bottled water consumption.  This has important consequences for policy analysis,  since the rebound effect  appears to be related to the availability of waste infrastructures:  better infrastructure, namely door to door collection, inflate the consumption of (plastic packaged) bottled water. We also provide robustness analysis for our results, specifically addressing the role of endogeneity issues.

AI.tldr: 本文利用意大利数据研究了塑料垃圾分类与瓶装水消费行为之间的关系，发现两者存在“反弹效应”：回收行为更积极的个体反而产生更多塑料垃圾。
AI.research_question: 塑料垃圾分类与瓶装水消费行为是互补还是替代关系？
AI.motivation: 环境问题的多维性日益受到关注，尤其是资源使用与其包装紧密相关的情况（如瓶装水消费）。
AI.theoretical_framework: 多维环境行为理论、反弹效应理论。
AI.method: 利用意大利横截面数据进行分析。
AI.findings: 发现回收行为更积极的个体反而产生更多塑料垃圾，反弹效应与废物基础设施的可用性相关。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了环境行为中的反弹效应及其与基础设施的关系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策分析提供重要启示，需注意基础设施对消费行为的潜在负面影响。

title: Fossil-Free Ecoinvent: A Parametric Model for Generating Defossilized Life Cycle Databases
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Fossil-Free Ecoinvent: A Parametric Model for Generating Defossilized Life Cycle Databases
detail.abstract: Imagine a society solely powered by renewable energies and without any use of fossil fuels. How would the environmental footprints of production and consumption change? Future-oriented life cycle assessment (LCA) seeks to answer this question by evaluating the environmental impacts of technologies under prospective conditions. However, available life cycle inventory databases (LCI-DBs) are reflecting contemporary conditions, and existing tools for modeling large-scale supply chain transformations lack versatility and transparency. To address this gap, we introduce "fossilfree_ecoinvent", a parametric and open-source tool for generating customized, partially or fully defossilized, versions of ecoinvent for future-oriented LCAs. The model systematically replaces fossil-based energy and material flows in electricity, heat, transport, and other sectors with alternatives, including renewable technologies, synthetic fuels, and electrified systems. We benchmark the resulting fossil-free LCI-DB against other databases that reflect defossilized scenarios, assess potential environmental trade-offs, and demonstrate its application through a case study on providing decent living standards.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种名为“fossilfree_ecoinvent”的开源工具，用于生成部分或完全去化石化的生命周期清单数据库，以支持面向未来的生命周期评估。
AI.research_question: 如何评估在完全依赖可再生能源且不使用化石燃料的社会中，生产和消费的环境足迹变化？
AI.motivation: 现有的生命周期清单数据库仅反映当前条件，且缺乏模拟大规模供应链转型的灵活性和透明度。
AI.theoretical_framework: 未来导向的生命周期评估（LCA）理论。
AI.method: 开发“fossilfree_ecoinvent”工具，系统替换化石能源和材料流为可再生能源、合成燃料和电气化系统。
AI.findings: 通过案例研究验证了工具的有效性，并评估了去化石化情景下的潜在环境权衡。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一种参数化、开源的工具，填补了未来导向LCA的数据库空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和研究人员提供了评估去化石化情景下环境影响的实用工具。

title: Biases in Information Choice and its Use: The Role of Strategic Uncertainty
affiliations: University of California, San Diego (UCSD) - Department of Economics and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Biases in Information Choice and its Use: The Role of Strategic Uncertainty
detail.abstract: We study experimentally how strategic uncertainty affects the way people choose and use information in a simple game that can be easily transformed into an individual decision task. We identify persistent overacquisition of information and an overall similar pattern of precision choices in both individual and strategic decision environments. In contrast, we find substantial overuse of private information in the strategic, but not in the individual decision setup. Moreover, we find that the overuse bias in the strategic environment is stronger in subjects who overacquire information and this relationship between biases cannot be explained by sunk-cost fallacies or popular models of bounded rationality. By disentangling forces related to the strategic environment, we argue that the overuse of information is driven by factors related to strategic belief formation and tensions in the information structure. We show that the overuse bias has negligible welfare effects, while overacquisition leads to significant welfare losses.

AI.tldr: 本文通过实验研究了战略不确定性如何影响人们在简单游戏中选择和使用信息的方式，发现信息过度获取和战略环境中信息的过度使用现象，并探讨了其背后的驱动因素和福利影响。
AI.research_question: 战略不确定性如何影响人们在决策中选择和使用信息的方式？
AI.motivation: 研究战略环境与个体决策环境中信息获取和使用的差异，揭示潜在的行为偏差及其原因。
AI.theoretical_framework: 战略不确定性、信息获取与使用、行为经济学、有限理性模型。
AI.method: 实验方法，对比个体决策与战略决策环境中的信息获取和使用行为。
AI.findings: 发现信息过度获取现象，战略环境中信息过度使用，且与信息过度获取者相关性更强；福利影响上，信息过度获取导致显著福利损失。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了战略环境中信息过度使用的驱动因素，挑战了沉没成本谬误和有限理性模型的解释。
AI.practical_contributions: 为理解战略决策中的行为偏差提供了实证依据，对政策设计和行为干预具有参考价值。

title: Rethinking crisis leadership through leadership-as-practice: A narrative review and future directions
affiliations: University of Turku, LUT University, University of Turku, Northeastern University - D’Amore-McKim School of Business and Finnish National Defense University

detail.title: Rethinking crisis leadership through leadership-as-practice: A narrative review and future directions

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The authors declare that they have no known competing financial interests or personal relationships that could have appeared to influence the work reported in this paper.

publicationDetails.detailsText: International Journal of Disaster Risk Reduction, volume 127, 2025[10.1016/j.ijdrr.2025.105671]

detail.abstract: While crisis leadership has received significant attention, existing scholarship lacks an analysis that can account for the collective, embodied and emergent nature of leadership in times of crisis. In this study, we employ a narrative review methodology as the primary analytic tool to synthesise insights on how leadership-as-practice (L-A-P) theory can be applied to crisis leadership, highlighting critical aspects of crisis leadership that are often overlooked by conventional perspectives. Accordingly, we outline three complementary avenues through which L-A-P can enrich crisis leadership research: by (1) enhancing understanding of the dynamic interplay between routines and improvisation, (2) exploring the intersections of leadership and learning during crisis; and (3) capturing collective forms of leadership that emerge under crisis conditions. As a theoretical foray, this study opens avenues for empirical research and offers insights for practitioners in organisations facing complex crises.

AI.tldr: 本文通过叙事综述方法，探讨了领导力即实践（L-A-P）理论在危机领导中的应用，填补了现有研究对危机领导集体性、具身性和涌现性分析的不足。
AI.research_question: 如何将领导力即实践（L-A-P）理论应用于危机领导研究？
AI.motivation: 现有研究未能充分分析危机领导的集体性、具身性和涌现性，本文旨在填补这一空白。

AI.findings: L-A-P理论可通过以下三方面丰富危机领导研究：（1）理解常规与即兴之间的动态互动；（2）探索危机中领导与学习的交叉点；（3）捕捉危机条件下涌现的集体领导形式。
AI.theory_contributions: 为危机领导研究提供了新的理论视角，并提出了未来实证研究的路径。
AI.practical_contributions: 为面临复杂危机的组织提供了实践启示。

title: Economics of NFTs: The Value of Creator Royalties
affiliations: University of Pennsylvania - Department of Computer and Information Science, Boston University - Questrom School of Business, University of Pennsylvania - The Wharton School and University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA) - Decisions, Operations, and Technology Management (DOTM) Area

detail.title: Economics of NFTs: The Value of Creator Royalties
detail.abstract: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are transforming how content creators, such as artists, price and sell their work. A key feature of NFTs is the inclusion of royalties, which grant creators a share of all future resale proceeds. Although widely used, critics argue that sophisticated speculators, which dominate the NFT market, simply price in royalties upfront, neutralizing their impact. We show this intuition to be true only under the assumption of perfect frictionless markets. Under more realistic market conditions, royalties enable creators to capitalize on the presence of speculators in at least three ways: They can enable risk sharing (under risk aversion), mitigate information asymmetry (when speculators are better informed) and unlock price discrimination benefits (in multi-unit settings). Moreover, in all three cases, royalties also meaningfully expand trade, implying increased.

AI.tldr: NFT的版税机制在无摩擦市场中可能被投机者提前定价抵消，但在现实市场条件下，版税能帮助创作者通过风险分担、减少信息不对称和价格歧视获益，并促进交易增长。
AI.research_question: NFT的版税机制如何在现实市场条件下为创作者创造价值？
AI.motivation: 尽管NFT版税被广泛使用，但批评者认为投机者会提前定价抵消其作用，本研究探讨版税在现实市场中的实际价值。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于市场摩擦理论、风险分担理论、信息不对称理论和价格歧视理论。
AI.method: 理论分析结合现实市场条件的假设。
AI.findings: 版税在现实市场中能帮助创作者通过风险分担、减少信息不对称和价格歧视获益，并促进交易增长。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了对NFT版税机制的理论理解，揭示了其在非完美市场中的作用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为创作者提供了利用版税机制的策略，并证明了其在现实市场中的有效性。

title: Longitudinal Assessment of User Acceptance of Explainable Artificial Intelligence (XAI): Analyzing Contextual Influences and Evolution Over Time
affiliations: Independent

detail.title: Longitudinal Assessment of User Acceptance of Explainable Artificial Intelligence (XAI): Analyzing Contextual Influences and Evolution Over Time
detail.abstract: As artificial intelligence (AI) systems become increasingly integrated into critical decisionmaking processes across various sectors, the need for transparency and interpretability has intensified. Explainable Artificial Intelligence (XAI) aims to address these concerns by providing users with insights into algorithmic decision-making. This study proposes a longitudinal assessment of user acceptance of XAI, focusing on how acceptance evolves over time in response to its contextual applications in healthcare, finance, and criminal justice. Utilizing a mixed-methods approach, the research will track user interactions with XAI systems at multiple time points, gathering both quantitative and qualitative data on user trust, perceived fairness, and overall satisfaction. The findings will offer valuable insights for practitioners and developers, informing the design of more effective and user-centric AI systems that enhance transparency and accountability. Ultimately, this research seeks to bridge the gap between technological advancement and user trust, fostering a more equitable integration of AI in society.

AI.tldr: 本研究提出了一种对可解释人工智能（XAI）用户接受度的纵向评估，重点关注其在医疗、金融和刑事司法领域的应用随时间的变化。通过混合方法，研究将追踪用户与XAI系统的互动，收集用户信任、感知公平性和满意度的数据，旨在为开发更透明、用户友好的AI系统提供指导。
AI.research_question: 用户对可解释人工智能（XAI）的接受度如何随时间变化，尤其是在医疗、金融和刑事司法领域的应用中？
AI.motivation: 随着人工智能（AI）系统在关键决策中的广泛应用，透明度和可解释性需求日益突出。XAI旨在解决这些问题，但用户对其接受度的动态变化尚未充分研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 本研究基于用户接受度理论、信任理论和公平性理论，探讨XAI在不同领域的应用效果。
AI.method: 采用混合方法，通过多时间点追踪用户与XAI系统的互动，收集定量和定性数据（如信任、公平性感知和满意度）。
AI.findings: 研究结果将揭示用户对XAI接受度的动态变化，为设计更透明、用户友好的AI系统提供依据。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了用户接受度理论在XAI领域的应用，拓展了信任和公平性理论在AI系统研究中的视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 为开发者和从业者提供实践指导，促进AI系统的透明度和用户信任，推动AI在社会中的公平应用。

title: Celebrating the Shopping Festival: The Effects on Retail Sales and its Drivers in a Shopping Mall
affiliations: Washington University in St. Louis - John M. Olin Business School, The University of Hong Kong  and Washington University in St. Louis - John M. Olin Business School

detail.title: Celebrating the Shopping Festival: The Effects on Retail Sales and its Drivers in a Shopping Mall
detail.abstract: We study the impacts of shopping festivals, short-term promotional events that involve various marketing activities, in a shopping mall. Using nine years of transaction data, we show that such events boost the revenue of stores inside the mall by up to 18.7 or 38.9 days of sales. Intertemporal substitutions can only partly explain the effect. We also show that the sales increases are driven by not only more foot traffic but also higher consumer spending during festivals. Nor are consumers only attracted by luxury brand promotions, as nonluxury brands also experience similar sales increases. Focusing on two main marketing activities during festivals, we find that while there is no clear evidence that store-specific promotions benefit participating stores, conditional promotions, a unique marketing activity planned and organized by the mall, can further boost sales and consumer spending for participating stores. The effectiveness, however, may rely on the participation rate of retailers and the design of the promotion. Finally, shopping festivals can effectively attract not only active but also inactive and new customers. These customers are associated with higher future spending, contributing to the long-term benefit of the mall.

AI.tldr: 购物节对商场内店铺收入有显著提升作用，最高可达18.7或38.9天的销售额。效应不仅来自客流增加，还源于消费者支出提高。非奢侈品牌同样受益。商场组织的条件促销活动能进一步推动销售，但其效果取决于零售商参与率和促销设计。购物节还能吸引新客户和活跃度低的客户，带来长期收益。
AI.research_question: 购物节对商场内店铺收入的影响及其驱动因素是什么？
AI.motivation: 探究购物节这类短期促销活动对商场内店铺的实际效果及其背后的机制。
AI.theoretical_framework: 促销活动对消费者行为的影响、跨期替代效应、品牌类型对促销效果的调节作用。
AI.method: 基于九年交易数据的实证分析。
AI.findings: 购物节显著提升店铺收入（最高38.9天销售额），效应来自客流和支出增加；非奢侈品牌同样受益；条件促销活动进一步推动销售。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了购物节对消费者行为的综合影响，补充了促销活动研究的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为商场和零售商设计促销活动提供了策略建议，如优化条件促销设计和提高参与率。

title: Privacy Agents
affiliations: ETH Zurich, Center for Law and Economics and City University of New York (CUNY) - Department of Law

detail.title: Privacy Agents

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The authors have no conflicting interests to declare.
declarations.ethicsApproval: This study was reviewed and approved by ETH Zurich’s Ethics Commission (EK 2024-N-229). The data and code to replicate this analysis are available upon request. Final data and scripts will be posted upon publication.
declarations.funderStatement: We acknowledge funding from the Program on the Economics of Privacy at George Mason University's school of law.

detail.abstract:
Law has explicitly affirmed the rights of firms to act through automation for decades, but only now have consumers achieved similar recognition for that right to automate, and even now only in limited circumstances. This work examines a quiet but consequential shift in U.S. data privacy law: the legal recognition of  Universal Opt-Out Mechanisms (UOOMs) for consumers to delegate some privacy choices to simple software tools. Though technically straightforward, these tools are legally innovative, enabling consumers to exercise new statutory rights to opt out of data sales at scale. What’s more, new UOOM statutes may already be taking an expected twist: the language of these statutes appears broad enough to encompass emerging consumer-side AI agents, suggesting that state data privacy law may have inadvertently laid the groundwork for an emerging AI governance regime.

But will consumers use these tools? Previous empirical studies have generally painted a bleak picture for privacy protections, suggesting that consumers are apathetic, confused, or overwhelmed when it comes to privacy affordances, legal or technical. Further work has shown the substantial capacity for firms to discourage consumer use of privacy self-advocacy. Blending legal rights and technical mechanisms, UOOMS seem unlikely to fare any better than previous consumer privacy initiatives. We conducted an online experiment to understand whether consumers are willing to adopt UOOMs, and what obstacles they may face if they do so. We hypothesized that both technical obstacles (difficulty of installation) and institutional friction (dark patterns) would render both UOOM uptake and retention rates low, but our results were surprising, and indeed joyful. Nearly 80% of participants installed an UOOM, and most continued using it a week later. These high rates held across demographic and geographic divides, suggesting that UOOMs can serve a broad population. 

UOOMs may be a rare convergence of usability, legal legitimacy, and consumer demand, but their future relevance is far from assured. Currently, few firms comply with UOOM requests, and state regulators appear inactive despite the ease of auditing for compliance. But providing consumers with autonomy as to their privacy has taken on a particular significance under a federal regime that increasingly relies on data purchases to circumvent traditional civil liberties protections. We therefore close in suggesting potential reforms to existing UOOM statutes, arguing in favor of mandating expanded availability and recognition of these tools as well as broadening their scope to other privacy statutory rights and beyond.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了美国数据隐私法中的一项重要变化：消费者通过通用选择退出机制（UOOMs）委托隐私选择权给软件工具的法律认可。尽管技术简单，但这些工具在法律上具有创新性，使消费者能够大规模行使数据销售选择退出权。研究发现消费者对UOOMs的接受度出乎意料地高，但未来仍需改革以扩大其适用范围和合规性。
AI.research_question: 消费者是否会使用通用选择退出机制（UOOMs）？他们面临哪些障碍？
AI.motivation: 研究UOOMs的法律认可和消费者使用情况，填补隐私保护工具实际效果的研究空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于数据隐私法和消费者行为理论，探讨法律与技术结合对隐私保护的影响。
AI.method: 通过在线实验，分析消费者对UOOMs的安装和使用情况。
AI.findings: 近80%的参与者安装了UOOMs，且大多数持续使用一周，表明消费者接受度高。
AI.theory_contributions: 为法律与技术结合的隐私保护工具提供了实证支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议改革UOOMs法规，扩大其适用范围和合规性，以增强消费者隐私自主权。

title: The Shadow Price of Advertising: A Factor Cost Extension of the Nerlove-Arrow Advertising Model
affiliations: Boston University - Department of Economics

detail.title: The Shadow Price of Advertising: A Factor Cost Extension of the Nerlove-Arrow Advertising Model
detail.abstract: In globalized, media-driven markets, corporate advertising and goodwill stocks systemically affect factor costs. Nerlove-Arrow's canonical 1962 advertising model, which remains the benchmark for dynamic advertising analysis, omits these cost-side channels and thus understates advertising optimums. This paper proposes an extension to the original framework with goodwill stock simultaneously augmenting demand and reducing capital and labour costs. Embedding these effects in a Cobb-Douglas format yields a tractable profit function and an infinite-horizon optimal-control problem which collapses to a single-state HJB equation. This augmentation serves to better model the real-world dynamics of corporate advertising in the salient media, meme-driven, and reflexively validated environments common to developed markets, primarily those of the United States.

AI.tldr: 本文扩展了Nerlove-Arrow的经典广告模型，通过引入商誉存量同时影响需求和降低资本与劳动力成本，更准确地模拟全球化、媒体驱动市场中的广告动态。
AI.research_question: 如何扩展Nerlove-Arrow的广告模型以更准确地反映商誉存量对需求和成本的双重影响？
AI.motivation: 经典模型忽略了广告对成本的影响，低估了广告的最优水平，无法适应现代媒体驱动市场的复杂性。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Nerlove-Arrow的动态广告模型，引入商誉存量对需求和成本的双重影响。
AI.method: 在Cobb-Douglas框架下构建利润函数，并通过无限时域最优控制问题求解单状态HJB方程。
AI.findings: 扩展后的模型能更好地模拟现实世界中媒体驱动和反射性验证环境下的广告动态。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了动态广告理论，填补了经典模型在成本渠道上的空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业在全球化、媒体驱动的市场中制定广告策略提供了更准确的模型支持。

title: The Labor Market Effects of Generative AI: A Difference-in-Differences Analysis of AI Exposure
affiliations: University of Texas at Austin and Stanford University

detail.title: The Labor Market Effects of Generative AI: A Difference-in-Differences Analysis of AI Exposure
detail.abstract: How is generative AI reshaping the labor market? We use a difference-indifferences approach leveraging (i) the timing of ChatGPT's release and (ii) variation in sectors' AI exposure owing to their occupational mix. Sectors that are more exposed to LLMs experienced significant increases in wages and employment following ChatGPT's release. These wage gains reflect genuine pay increases rather than changes in worker composition and are stronger for young and highly paid workers. However, sectors where AI can directly substitute for human labor saw significant declines in wages and employment. The results show AI's effects depend on whether the technology augments or substitutes for human effort.

AI.tldr: 生成式AI对劳动力市场的影响因技术是增强还是替代人力而异。高AI暴露行业在ChatGPT发布后工资和就业显著增长，而AI可直接替代人力的行业则出现下降。
AI.research_question: 生成式AI如何重塑劳动力市场？
AI.motivation: 探讨AI技术对劳动力市场的差异化影响，特别是增强与替代人力的不同效果。
AI.theoretical_framework: 差异中的差异方法（DID），利用ChatGPT发布时间和行业AI暴露差异。
AI.method: 基于ChatGPT发布时间和行业AI暴露差异的双重差分分析。
AI.findings: 高AI暴露行业工资和就业显著增长，而AI替代行业则下降；年轻高薪工人获益更多。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示AI对劳动力市场的影响取决于其是增强还是替代人力。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和企业提供AI技术应用的劳动力市场影响参考。

reference: FRB of Chicago Working Paper No. 2025-11
title: Artificial Intelligence in the Office and the Factory: Evidence from Administrative Software Registry Data
affiliations: Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago

detail.title: Artificial Intelligence in the Office and the Factory: Evidence from Administrative Software Registry Data

publicationDetails.detailsText: FRB of Chicago Working Paper No. 2025-11
publicationDetails.journalName: Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago Research Paper Series

detail.abstract: I use administrative data on artificial intelligence (AI) software created in Brazil to study its effects on the labor market. Owing to a unique copyright system, Brazilian firms have registered their software with the government since the 1980s, creating a detailed record of nearly all commercial AI applications developed in the country. Drawing on this registry, I show that AI is widely used not only in administrative tasks but also in production settings, where it primarily supports process optimization and quality control. Using an instrument based on variation in software development costs, I find that AI affects administrative and production workers differently. Among office workers, AI reduces employment and wages, particularly for middle-wage earners. Among production workers, it increases employment of low-skilled and young workers operating machinery. These results suggest that AI displaces routine office tasks while making machines more productive and easier to operate, leading to a net increase in employment.

AI.tldr: 本文利用巴西的人工智能（AI）软件行政数据，研究其对劳动力市场的影响。研究发现，AI在行政和生产环境中广泛应用，对办公室和生产工人的影响不同：办公室就业和工资下降，而生产工人就业增加。
AI.research_question: 人工智能（AI）对巴西劳动力市场的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 利用巴西独特的版权系统数据，研究AI在行政和生产环境中的实际应用及其对就业和工资的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于AI对劳动力市场的异质性影响理论，区分行政和生产任务的不同效应。
AI.method: 利用巴西政府记录的AI软件注册数据，采用基于软件开发成本变化的工具变量方法。
AI.findings: AI在行政任务中减少就业和工资（尤其是中等收入者），在生产任务中增加低技能和年轻工人的就业。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了AI对劳动力市场的异质性影响，补充了关于技术替代和互补效应的理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了AI对就业影响的实证依据，建议关注不同行业的劳动力调整策略。

title: Analyzing the Impact of Explainable AI in Facilitating Better Collaboration Between Humans and Machines in Manufacturing and Supply Chain Environments
affiliations: Independent, Institute of Chartered Accountant in England & Wales and Bangladesh University of Business & Technology

detail.title: Analyzing the Impact of Explainable AI in Facilitating Better Collaboration Between Humans and Machines in Manufacturing and Supply Chain Environments
detail.abstract: This research examines the impact of Explainable Artificial Intelligence (XAI) on enhancing collaboration between humans and machines in manufacturing and supply chain environments. As industries increasingly integrate AI technologies, the need for transparency and interpretability becomes paramount to ensure effective human-machine interaction. This study explores how XAI fosters trust among operators, improves decision-making processes, and enhances workforce training and engagement. Through a mixed-methods approach, including surveys and case studies, we assess the perceptions of various stakeholders regarding XAI's role in operational settings. Findings indicate that XAI not only facilitates better understanding of AI-driven insights but also empowers human operators to leverage these insights for improved efficiency and responsiveness. Additionally, the research highlights the importance of XAI in addressing ethical considerations and promoting a culture of continuous improvement. Ultimately, this study provides valuable implications for organizations seeking to optimize their AI implementations and improve collaborative practices in dynamic manufacturing and supply chain environments.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了可解释人工智能（XAI）如何提升制造业和供应链环境中人机协作的效果，强调透明度和可解释性对信任、决策和培训的重要性。
AI.research_question: 可解释人工智能（XAI）如何促进制造业和供应链环境中的人机协作？
AI.motivation: 随着AI技术在工业中的广泛应用，透明度和可解释性成为确保有效人机交互的关键。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于可解释人工智能（XAI）的理论框架，探讨其对信任、决策和培训的影响。
AI.method: 采用混合方法，包括问卷调查和案例研究，评估利益相关者对XAI在操作环境中的看法。
AI.findings: XAI不仅帮助人类更好地理解AI驱动的见解，还提升操作员的效率和响应能力，同时解决伦理问题并促进持续改进文化。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了XAI在工业环境中的应用理论，强调了透明度和信任的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为组织优化AI实施和提升协作实践提供了实用建议。

title: Socioeconomic Tradeoff on Connected and Automated Vehicles Scheduling at a Reservation-based Intersection
affiliations: University of Alabama - Department of Information Systems, Statistics, and Management Science and University of Alabama

detail.title: Socioeconomic Tradeoff on Connected and Automated Vehicles Scheduling at a Reservation-based Intersection
detail.abstract: The socioeconomic benefits of deploying connected and automated vehicles (CAVs) at a reservation-based intersection (RBI) include savings from reduced travel delays and collision costs. Although individual improvement is predicted in delay or collision cost, their coupled outcome is not measured at an RBI. A tradeoff on the benefits further intensifies this question. Motivated by explaining their complicated or harmonized relationship, we make hypotheses and test them using the Pareto Frontier and regression analyses. We formulate a bi-objective optimization model on a simulation-optimizationin-the-loop (SOIL) framework, which provides a fundamental ground for controlled experiments. We observe the tradeoff between delay and expected collision costs on the frontier. We further compare the estimation between fixed effects and pooling Ordinary Least Squares (OLS) models and find that the tradeoff exists regardless of exogenous experiment settings at an RBI involving CAVs. This result also aligns with a theoretical finding on topology for a queueing server system. We believe that this socioeconomic tradeoff analysis highly contributes to policymaking on prioritized social welfare in this competitive CAV industry at an RBI.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了在基于预约的交叉口（RBI）部署联网自动驾驶车辆（CAVs）的社会经济效益，重点关注延迟和碰撞成本之间的权衡关系。通过帕累托前沿和回归分析，验证了这种权衡的存在，并提出了政策建议。
AI.research_question: 在基于预约的交叉口（RBI）部署联网自动驾驶车辆（CAVs）时，延迟和碰撞成本之间的权衡关系是什么？
AI.motivation: 尽管CAVs在延迟或碰撞成本方面可能带来个体改进，但两者在RBI中的耦合效应尚未被量化，且其权衡关系尚不明确。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究基于帕累托前沿和回归分析，并结合排队服务器系统的拓扑理论。
AI.method: 采用仿真优化循环（SOIL）框架下的双目标优化模型，并通过固定效应和普通最小二乘法（OLS）模型进行对比分析。
AI.findings: 研究发现，延迟和预期碰撞成本之间存在权衡关系，且这种关系不受RBI中外生实验设置的影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 研究验证了排队服务器系统拓扑理论的适用性，并扩展了对CAVs社会经济效益的理解。
AI.practical_contributions: 研究结果为RBI中CAVs的政策制定提供了依据，有助于优先考虑社会福利。

title: Tapping Potential: How Law School Deans Can Lead Faculty to be Good Institutional Citizens
affiliations: Wake Forest University - School of Law and George Washington University - Law School

detail.title: Tapping Potential: How Law School Deans Can Lead Faculty to be Good Institutional Citizens
detail.abstract: Scholars have paid scant attention to the role of the law school dean. However, what has been observed is that law school deans are faced with a myriad jobs and duties, which include overseeing an administrative apparatus that (1) coordinates scores of courses each semester; (2) manages faculty and faculty committees; (3) oversees clinical, externship, pro bono, and public interest programs; (4) supports hundreds of students, individually and through student organizations; (5) maintains connections with alumni; (6) engages with central administration; and (7) fundraises. The diversity of tasks deals with areas of "student matters, staff matters, strategic planning, budget, external relations, fundraising, 'bushfires' and other crises, university-wide matters, discipline-wide matters, and these are apart from any residual scholarly or teaching ambitions."  Therefore, one of the challenges faced by deans is that they must prioritize numerous individual duties to ensure they address the most important matters first. Beyond these duties, there are also numerous, more tedious tasks and complications. Law school deans, directly or indirectly, must  (1) ensure that staff vacation and sick days are not abused; (2) navigate the political realities of tensions between law school employees; (3) work most weekends; and (4) endure being bogged down by meetings. These tasks, although not enjoyable, are crucial responsibilities that law school deans must undertake in addition to their regular duties. In short, they must trade “a comfortable life of teaching, scholarship, and minimal administrative responsibility for a life of administrative drudgery, very little teaching, and virtually no time for scholarship.” This Article utilizes empirical, theoretical, and practical perspectives to explore what law school deans should know to effectively leverage the human capital of law faculties in advancing the needs of law schools and their constituencies.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了法学院院长在多重职责和挑战下的角色，包括行政管理、教职员工管理、学生支持、校友关系、筹款等，并提出了如何有效利用教职人力资本以推动法学院发展的建议。

title: Knowledge Management Strategies in Attracting Foreign Direct Investments: The Case of Investment Promotion Agencies in Emerging Economies
affiliations: ACTAG

detail.title: Knowledge Management Strategies in Attracting Foreign Direct Investments: The Case of Investment Promotion Agencies in Emerging Economies
detail.abstract: This study examines the strategic role of knowledge management in enhancing the foreign direct investment (FDI) attraction capabilities of Investment Promotion Agencies (IPAs) in emerging economies. By integrating the resource-based view of the firm with knowledge management theory, this research develops a comprehensive theoretical framework that explains how IPAs can leverage knowledge as a strategic resource to gain competitive advantages in the global FDI market. Through systematic literature review and theoretical analysis, the study identifies four distinct knowledge management strategies employed by IPAs: external knowledge acquisition, internal knowledge development, knowledge codification, and knowledge personalization. The research addresses critical gaps in public sector knowledge management literature while acknowledging the heterogeneity among IPAs in terms of resources, capabilities, and operational contexts. The findings contribute to both theoretical understanding and practical applications, offering insights for policymakers, IPA managers, and scholars interested in public sector innovation and economic development strategies.

detail.title: The Future of Automated Warehousing: Robotics and AI in Transforming Inventory Management and Supply Chain Resilience
detail.abstract: The advent of automated warehousing, driven by advancements in robotics and artificial intelligence (AI), is reshaping the landscape of inventory management and supply chain resilience. This research explores the transformative impact of these technologies on warehouse operations, emphasizing increased efficiency, accuracy, and adaptability in managing inventory flows. AI algorithms further optimize inventory management through predictive analytics, enabling real-time decision-making and demand forecasting. The study also examines the resilience of automated systems in mitigating supply chain disruptions, particularly in response to global challenges such as pandemics and geopolitical tensions. Through case studies and industry analyses, this research highlights best practices and potential pitfalls, providing a roadmap for organizations seeking to leverage automation for competitive advantage. Ultimately, the findings underscore the critical role of automated warehousing in fostering agile, responsive supply chains capable of thriving in an increasingly complex market environment.

detail.abstract: This research investigates the effectiveness of green logistics strategies in reducing the carbon footprint within supply chain management. As global concerns about climate change intensify, organizations are increasingly adopting sustainable practices to mitigate their environmental impact. This study evaluates various green logistics strategies, including eco-friendly transportation, waste reduction, energy-efficient warehousing, and sustainable sourcing. Through a comprehensive review of existing literature and case studies, the research analyzes the implementation and outcomes of these strategies in diverse industries. Key performance indicators related to carbon emissions, operational efficiency, and cost-effectiveness are examined to assess the overall impact of green logistics on supply chains. The findings indicate that organizations employing robust green logistics strategies can achieve significant reductions in their carbon footprint while also enhancing operational performance and stakeholder satisfaction.

detail.title: The Role of Advanced Analytics in Supply Chain Risk Management: Identifying Vulnerabilities and Enhancing Decision-Making Processes
detail.abstract: In today's complex and interconnected global economy, supply chain risk management has become a critical focus for organizations seeking to enhance resilience and ensure operational continuity. This research explores the role of advanced analytics in identifying vulnerabilities within supply chains and improving decision-making processes. By leveraging data-driven insights, organizations can proactively assess risks, predict disruptions, and develop effective mitigation strategies. The study employs a mixed-methods approach, combining quantitative analysis of risk data with qualitative case studies of organizations that have successfully implemented advanced analytics in their supply chain operations. Key findings highlight how predictive modeling, machine learning, and real-time data analysis can enhance visibility, foster collaboration among stakeholders, and enable more informed decision-making. Furthermore, the research identifies best practices for integrating advanced analytics into existing risk management frameworks, emphasizing the importance of a culture that embraces data-driven approaches. Ultimately, this study contributes to the understanding of how advanced analytics can transform supply chain risk management, offering practical implications for practitioners aiming to build more resilient and agile supply chains in the face of uncertainty.

title: Global Investors, Hidden Suppliers: How Institutions Shape the Impact of Stock Market Liberalization Programs on Corporate Responsibility
affiliations: The University of Hong Kong - Faculty of Business and Economics, Renmin University of China and South China Normal University

detail.title: Global Investors, Hidden Suppliers: How Institutions Shape the Impact of Stock Market Liberalization Programs on Corporate Responsibility

publicationDetails.detailsText: Accepted at Journal of International Business Studies

detail.abstract: Research suggests that firms participating in stock market liberalization programs are exposed to global investors who can exert cross-border influence on management decisions. Accordingly, as global investors increasingly adopt environmental, social, and governance (ESG) principles, firms in these programs may enhance their corporate responsibility and their commitment to addressing grand challenges. We challenge this literature by explaining why this effect of stock market liberalization programs should not be taken for granted, especially in emerging markets and contribute to the field by showing that institutional factors moderate this relationship. Using China’s stock market liberalization programs as natural experiments that quasi-exogenously connect emerging-market firms to global investors, we find that emerging-market firms in stock liberalization programs reduce their disclosure of supplier identity information, an important step in tackling environmental grand challenges. However, when emerging-market firms have certain characteristics, such as a large proportion of committed foreign ownership, global environmental certifications, and top leadership with overseas experience, the negative effect is diminished and even reversed as the balance between the long-term upsides and short-term downsides of voluntary supplier disclosure shifts.

publicationDetails.detailsText: Review of Business and Economics Studies, volume 13, issue 2, 2025[10.26794/2308-944X-2025-13-2-6-39]

detail.abstract: This systematic review aims to analyze the contributions of Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) to sustainable development by examining how businesses address critical global challenges such as zero hunger, health and well-being, gender equality, clean water and sanitation, sustainable cities, life on land, and peace and justice. Purpose: The study seeks to identify gaps in the existing literature and propose future research directions. Method: A comprehensive literature search was conducted across multiple bibliometric databases, yielding 2,520 studies. After applying stringent inclusion and exclusion criteria, 100 relevant studies were selected for analysis. The review synthesized empirical and theoretical findings, focusing on the effectiveness of CSR initiatives and their alignment with the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Results: The findings reveal that while CSR initiatives significantly contribute to addressing global challenges, there are critical gaps in their longterm sustainability and effectiveness, particularly in developing regions. The review highlights the importance of integrating stakeholder engagement, addressing systemic inequalities, and measuring the impact of CSR practices to enhance their effectiveness. Contributions: This study provides valuable insights into the role of CSR in fostering sustainable development, contributing to existing theories and offering practical applications for industry and policymakers. It identifies underexplored areas for future research, emphasizing the need for robust frameworks that ensure CSR initiatives are equitable, inclusive, and sustainable.

title: Navigating the constricted and narrow path – understanding the limited scope of Section 37 of the Arbitration & Conciliation Act, 1996, while challenging orders passed under Section 17.
affiliations: Independent

detail.title: Navigating the constricted and narrow path – understanding the limited scope of Section 37 of the Arbitration & Conciliation Act, 1996, while challenging orders passed under Section 17.

contentFormat.other: Legal research on the scope of Section 37 from an order under section 17 of the Arbitration and Conciliation Act 1996

detail.abstract:
This article examines the circumscribed scope of appellate jurisdiction under Section 37(2)(b) of the Arbitration & Conciliation Act, 1996, when challenging interim orders passed by arbitral tribunals under Section 17. While the Supreme Court has not directly addressed the scope of Section 37(2)(b), it has extensively interpreted the limited jurisdiction under Section 37(1)(c), establishing that appellate courts cannot travel beyond the restrictions contained in Section 34.

Through a comprehensive analysis of recent High Court decisions from Bombay, Delhi, and Calcutta, this article demonstrates how courts have drawn parallels between Section 37(1)(c) and Section 37(2)(b), developing a consistent jurisprudence that severely restricts judicial interference with arbitral interim orders. The article identifies ten key principles emerging from this jurisprudence, including the plausibility test, the higher threshold for reviewing discretionary orders, and the prohibition against merit-based review or micro-management of ongoing arbitrations.

The article concludes that courts exercising jurisdiction under Section 37(2)(b) must maintain an "extremely circumspect approach," interfering only where orders are patently illegal, perverse, or unconscionable. This narrow scope of review aligns with the legislative intent to minimise judicial intervention in arbitration proceedings. It upholds the ethos of the Arbitration Act as a self-contained code promoting alternative dispute resolution.

detail.title: IRIS-X Field Validation: Subsurface Exploration for Natural Hydrogen and Helium in Serpentinization and Radiolysis Formations -Padang Region, Indonesia
detail.abstract: This investigation presents the comprehensive field validation of the IRIS-X (Integrated Reconnaissance and Imaging System-eXtended) platform for subsurface exploration of natural hydrogen and helium resources in serpentinization and radiolysis geological formations within the Padang region, West Sumatra, Indonesia. The system leverages proprietary nanomaterial-based detection matrices integrated with advanced metaloxide semiconductor sensor arrays and machine learning algorithms to achieve unprecedented analytical precision in complex subsurface environments. Executed over a 14-week validation campaign across tectonically active ophiolite complexes and granitic basement formations, the deployment architecture employed a radial well configuration with central injection at 100-meter depth and peripheral capture arrays at 70-meter depth, encompassing interrogation volumes of approximately 20,000 m² per configuration. The nanomaterial platform incorporates engineered nanoparticles (10-30 nm) with tailored surface chemistry exhibiting selective affinity for target analytes through chemisorption mechanisms, achieving detection sensitivities spanning low-yield radiolytic outputs (tens of ppm) to high-concentration serpentinization regimes (thousands of ppm). Multi-modal detection capabilities integrate Surface-Enhanced Raman Scattering with femtomolar sensitivity (10⁻¹⁵ M), fluorescence spectroscopy, and electrochemical transduction to provide orthogonal validation of analytical measurements. Artificial intelligence algorithms process sensor telemetry through neural network architectures trained on synthetic datasets, executing realtime three-dimensional pathway reconstruction and volumetric resource estimation via geostatistical interpolation with Monte Carlo uncertainty quantification. Empirical results demonstrate exceptional performance metrics including 92% detection efficacy across variable lithological settings, cost reduction of 95-98% relative to conventional drilling programs, and deployment cycle compression from 6-18 months to 1-2 weeks. The system successfully quantified hydrogen concentrations from trace radiolytic signatures to elevated hydrothermal yields while maintaining measurement precision within ±5% variance across environmental gradients encompassing tropical humidity conditions (80-95%), temperature fluctuations (24-32°C), and high precipitation regimes (>2,500 mm annually). Resource quantification delineated 5-10 million m³ hydrogen accumulations with concomitant helium signatures, validated through independent geochemical correlation analysis achieving 95-98% accuracy. Environmental performance exceeded regulatory standards through zero-incident operations, minimal surface disturbance (<0.1% footprint compared to conventional methods), and biodegradable nanomaterial formulations ensuring complete environmental breakdown within predetermined degradation pathways. The platform's resilience to aqueous saturation conditions enables operation in waterlogged tropical terrains where conventional surface expression methods demonstrate limited effectiveness. This technological advancement establishes new paradigms for sustainable exploration of clean energy resources, providing scalable solutions for accelerating natural hydrogen and helium discovery while maintaining superior
