detail.abstract: This strategy brief dives into the operational complexities of managing multinational subsidiaries in geopolitically volatile regions. Based on my leadership as Senior Executive Officer and ActingCOOof an international investment holding company, this paper highlights real-world methods used to drive synergy across subsidiaries in emerging markets and conflict-impacted zones. While previous articles have addressed policy harmonization and workforce alignment, this work focuses exclusively on operational synchronization, crisis-mode project continuity, cross-border logistics, and executive governance frameworks that ensure mission execution under conditions of uncertainty. With a focus on enterprise agility, intersubsidiary data coordination, and resilience planning, this brief provides actionable strategies for sustaining growth and stability where operational predictability is low — all informed by direct oversight of high-stakes projects in Bosnia & Herzegovina, South Sudan, Syria, Lebanon, SaudiArabia, UAE, Liberia, and Turkey.

detail.abstract: This strategic logistics report presents a high-impact framework for optimizing defense support operations across U.S. military camps in the Middle East, with a focused case study on Kuwait. Drawing from my leadership experience across Camp Arifjan (Zones 1–8), Camp Buehring (Udairi, Feed Tent, Silver Bullet & Desert Wind), Ali Al-Salem Air Base, KNB, and Sabah Al-Ahmad Base, the report breaks down the logistics ecosystem—manpower flow, transport coordination, material staging, DFAC delivery systems, and contractor alignment. This work proposes a modular logistics framework tailored for multi-contractor environments (e.g., KBR-AP, Amentum, Vectrus, Constellis, DynCorp, Louis Berger), capable of adapting to troop surges, terrain limitations, and force protection protocols. The framework addresses bottlenecks such as redundant clearances, last-mile delays, and fragmented base access procedures, offering practical solutions rooted in real-world execution. The result is a replicable model for the U.S. Department of Defense and its subcontractors, engineered to achieve mission continuity with reduced logistical drag.

title: Actor-Network Creation and Effective Career Management within the University Entrepreneurial Ecosystem: A Study on Technology Transfer Office Managers
affiliations: University of New York Tirana

detail.title: Actor-Network Creation and Effective Career Management within the University Entrepreneurial Ecosystem: A Study on Technology Transfer Office Managers
detail.abstract: Technology transfer offices (TTOs), which are one of the interface structures operating within the framework of Public-University-Industry Collaboration (PUIC), have contributed to the entrepreneurship ecosystem in many different dimensions -project support, university-industry collaboration, protection of intellectual property rights, entrepreneurial and venture capital leadership, internship assistance to students on projects, support on legal issues, etc. - until they established their current position. Therefore, TTOs are an indispensable part of this environment, given their position in the entrepreneurship ecosystem today. Using actor-network and stakeholder approaches as theoretical lenses, the present research examines the role of TTOs in entrepreneurial ecosystem formation and function and analyzes how interface activities shape collaborative environments embedded within entrepreneurial ecosystems. In terms of the unit of analysis, TTOs operating in Turkey have been selected from the University-Industry Collaboration Centers Platform of Turkey as the area of investigation, and the data of the people who have undertaken/are undertaking managerial duties in these interface structures within the period 2013-2023 have been analyzed. The findings of the study are based on a dataset combining curriculum vita and interviews, the results of the study indicate significant differences between the managers who have previous industry and project experience and those who do not. In addition, the problem of dual careers of managers has been effective in increasing the staff turnover rate in TTOs.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了技术转移办公室（TTOs）在创业生态系统中的角色，分析了其界面活动如何塑造协作环境。研究基于土耳其的TTOs数据，发现管理者背景对TTOs运作有显著影响。
AI.research_question: TTOs在创业生态系统形成和功能中扮演什么角色？其界面活动如何影响协作环境？
AI.motivation: TTOs作为公共-大学-产业合作（PUIC）的重要接口结构，对创业生态系统有多维度贡献，但其具体角色和影响尚未充分研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 采用行动者网络理论和利益相关者理论作为理论框架。
AI.method: 以土耳其的TTOs为研究对象，分析2013-2023年间管理者的履历和访谈数据。
AI.findings: 研究发现，有行业和项目经验的管理者与无经验者存在显著差异；管理者的双重职业问题增加了TTOs的员工流动率。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了TTOs在创业生态系统中角色的理论理解，强调了管理者背景的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为TTOs的招聘和管理提供了实践建议，如重视管理者的行业经验并解决双重职业问题。

title: Financial Literacy and Household Saving Behaviour in Ghana: A Three-Component Framework for Financial Inclusion
affiliations: School of Economics, University of Edinburgh and University of Edinburgh

detail.title: Financial Literacy and Household Saving Behaviour in Ghana: A Three-Component Framework for Financial Inclusion
detail.abstract: This study examines the determinants of household saving behaviour in Ghana, with particular focus on financial literacy and broader dimensions of financial inclusion. Using nationally representative data from the FinScope Consumer Ghana Survey in 2021, we develop a novel three-component framework that disaggregates financial inclusion into financial literacy, financial access, and behavioural biases. Employing an instrumental variable approach to address endogeneity concerns, we find that financial literacy significantly influences saving behaviour, with its effect varying across demographic subgroups. Financial access consistently plays a prominent role in shaping saving decisions. In some contexts, behavioural biases, such as trust and stigma, also serve as strong determinants. Our findings contribute to the literature in a threefold manner. Primarily, by developing a three-component framework for financial inclusion which can be replicated across developing and developed contexts. Secondly, by providing credible causal identification through a structured auxiliary evidence framework for instrument validation. Thirdly, by offering policy-relevant insights for Ghana's National Financial Inclusion and Development Strategy. Our results suggest that targeted interventions, addressing specific components of financial inclusion, may be more effective than broad-based approaches currently at play.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了加纳家庭储蓄行为的决定因素，重点关注金融素养和金融包容性的多个维度。通过2021年FinScope加纳消费者调查数据，提出了一个新颖的三维框架，将金融包容性分解为金融素养、金融获取和行为偏差。研究发现金融素养显著影响储蓄行为，且其效果因人口亚群而异；金融获取在储蓄决策中起重要作用；行为偏差（如信任和污名）在某些情况下也是重要决定因素。研究贡献包括提出可复制的三维框架、提供因果识别方法，并为加纳国家金融包容性战略提供政策建议。
AI.research_question: 加纳家庭储蓄行为的决定因素是什么？特别是金融素养和金融包容性的多维影响。
AI.motivation: 理解金融素养和金融包容性对储蓄行为的影响，为加纳及其他发展中国家的政策制定提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 三维金融包容性框架：金融素养、金融获取和行为偏差。
AI.method: 使用2021年FinScope加纳消费者调查数据，采用工具变量法解决内生性问题。
AI.findings: 金融素养显著影响储蓄行为，效果因人口亚群而异；金融获取在储蓄决策中起重要作用；行为偏差（如信任和污名）在某些情况下也是重要决定因素。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出可复制的三维金融包容性框架；提供因果识别的结构化辅助证据框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为加纳国家金融包容性战略提供政策建议，指出针对性干预比广泛措施更有效。

title: Oil Prices and Economic Growth in Oil Producing Countries: A Panel Data Approach
affiliations: Pan African University, University of Ilorin, , University of Ilorin,  and University of Ilorin,

detail.title: Oil Prices and Economic Growth in Oil Producing Countries: A Panel Data Approach
detail.abstract: Oil prices have garnered increasing attention from academia, international communities, international organisations, oil companies, policymakers, and governments. This study examines the OPEC members' economic growth regarding oil price, oil production, capital, and labour stocks. The study used the Augmented Dickey-Fuller (ADF) to test for unit roots among the variables. The test result shows that although none of the variables is stationary at level, they are all stationary at first difference. Based on the Hausman test, the fixed effect was the suitable analysis method. The study, therefore, found that oil production is not significant in influencing the economic growth of OPEC member countries. In contrast, oil prices, labour force, and capital formation significantly affect countries' economic growth. The relationship between oil prices and oil-producing countries' economic growth is negative. The study recommends that OPEC member countries develop competitive goods and services to serve as an alternative source of generating revenue. It was also recommended that oil-producing countries should take advantage of their labour force by developing them and making them available for brain export to improve foreign currency inflow in the medium term.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了OPEC成员国经济增长与油价、石油产量、资本和劳动力之间的关系，发现油价、劳动力和资本对经济增长有显著影响，而石油产量不显著。建议OPEC成员国发展替代收入来源并优化劳动力利用。
AI.research_question: OPEC成员国的经济增长如何受油价、石油产量、资本和劳动力影响？
AI.motivation: 油价对全球经济影响深远，研究其对OPEC成员国经济增长的具体作用有助于政策制定。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于经济增长理论，分析油价、资本和劳动力对经济的影响。
AI.method: 使用ADF检验变量单位根，Hausman检验选择固定效应模型。
AI.findings: 油价、劳动力和资本显著影响经济增长，石油产量不显著；油价与经济增长呈负相关。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了油价与经济增长的负相关性，补充了经济增长理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议OPEC成员国发展替代产业和优化劳动力，以减少对石油收入的依赖。

title: Food Waste in Online Grocery Platforms: Operational Drivers and Evidence from Indonesia
affiliations: Pennsylvania State University - Department of Supply Chain & Information Systems, Seoul National University, Seoul National University, SNU Business School and Arizona State University (ASU) - W.P. Carey School of Business

detail.title: Food Waste in Online Grocery Platforms: Operational Drivers and Evidence from Indonesia
detail.abstract: Food waste remains a significant operational challenge in grocery retail, and the rise of online grocery platforms introduces new dynamics to this issue. In this study, we examine the drivers of food waste on a large farm-to-table platform in Indonesia that operates both business-to-business (B2B) and business-to-consumer (B2C) channels. Methodology/results: We collaborate with Sayurbox and analyze detailed inbound procurement order-product level data and outbound customer order data across its two channels. Using a two-part empirical model, we estimate the probability and volume of food waste as a result of demand scale, supply structure, and platform profit policy. We find that a larger customer base reduces waste, particularly in the B2C channel. A larger supply base and higher markup percentages lead to higher waste. Direct farm sourcing reduces waste in B2B, but its benefits are muted in B2C, likely due to greater distance from agricultural production zones and associated logistical frictions. Counterfactual analyses suggest that supply-side adjustments could reduce total waste by up to 16%. Managerial Implications: Our findings underscore the operational value of demand aggregation, the risks of supplier overexpansion, and the need to balance markup strategies and sourcing modes to reduce waste across different fulfillment channels.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨了印尼大型农产品平台Sayurbox中B2B和B2C渠道的食物浪费驱动因素，发现客户规模扩大减少浪费，而供应商扩张和高利润率增加浪费。直接农场采购在B2B中有效，但在B2C中效果有限。供应链调整可减少16%浪费。
AI.research_question: 在线杂货平台中，B2B和B2C渠道的食物浪费驱动因素是什么？
AI.motivation: 食物浪费是杂货零售的重要运营挑战，而在线平台的兴起为其带来新动态。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于需求规模、供应结构和平台利润政策的两部分实证模型。
AI.method: 与Sayurbox合作，分析采购订单和客户订单数据，采用两部分模型估计浪费概率和量。
AI.findings: 客户规模扩大减少浪费（B2C更显著），供应商扩张和高利润率增加浪费。直接农场采购在B2B有效，B2C中效果有限。供应链调整可减少16%浪费。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了在线平台中不同渠道食物浪费的驱动因素及差异。
AI.practical_contributions: 强调了需求聚合的运营价值、供应商过度扩张的风险，以及平衡利润策略和采购模式的重要性。

title: The Strategic Risk of Delayed and Non-Adoption of Artificial Intelligence: Evidence from Organizational Decline in Extinction Zones
affiliations: SBS Swiss Business School

detail.title: The Strategic Risk of Delayed and Non-Adoption of Artificial Intelligence: Evidence from Organizational Decline in Extinction Zones
detail.abstract: Artificial intelligence (AI) is foundational to competitive strategy and operational resilience in today's digital transformation era. However, the delayed or non-adoption of AI technologies poses significant strategic risks that are often underestimated. This paper presents and elaborates on the concept of AI Extinction Zones, a market environment characterized by insufficient AI integration resulting in gradual organizational decline. Drawing on a narrative literature review and comparative case analysis, the study identifies five interrelated risk factors contributing to this decline: organizational inertia, strategic myopia, leadership deficits, resource misallocation, and ethical paralysis. By examining public cases, such as Sears, Bed Bath & Beyond, Walmart, and Moderna, this paper demonstrates that shallow or delayed adoption of artificial intelligence undermines innovation, market relevance, and long-term viability. The findings indicate that failure to adopt is not the sole threat; rather, superficial or misaligned adoption can also prove to be equally detrimental. A strategic resilience framework is proposed to assist organizations in evading or preventing extinction, focusing on deep integration, leadership capabilities, cultural agility, and timely investment. This study contributes to the discourse on digital transformation by recontextualizing AI adoption as a multidimensional strategic commitment rather than merely a technical upgrade.

AI.tldr: 本文提出“AI灭绝区”概念，指因AI整合不足导致组织逐渐衰退的市场环境，并通过案例研究揭示了五大风险因素。研究强调AI深度整合的重要性，并提出了战略韧性框架。
AI.research_question: AI技术延迟或浅层采用如何导致组织衰退？
AI.motivation: 在数字化转型时代，AI对竞争战略和运营韧性至关重要，但其延迟或非采用常被低估。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于文献综述和案例比较，提出“AI灭绝区”概念及五大风险因素。
AI.method: 采用叙事性文献综述和比较案例分析法，分析公开案例（如Sears、Walmart等）。
AI.findings: 浅层或延迟的AI采用会削弱创新、市场相关性和长期生存能力。
AI.theory_contributions: 将AI采用重新定义为多维战略承诺，而非单纯技术升级。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出战略韧性框架，帮助组织避免AI灭绝区。

title: Transdisciplinary Knowledge Production for Integrated Climate Risk Management: Application of a Framework in the Dutch Urbanized Delta
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Delft University of Technology and Delft University of Technology

detail.title: Transdisciplinary Knowledge Production for Integrated Climate Risk Management: Application of a Framework in the Dutch Urbanized Delta
detail.abstract: Climate change increasingly impacts the built environment through rising sea levels, intensifying heatwaves, and frequent extreme weather events, especially in low-lying, densely populated countries like the Netherlands. Despite growing urgency, current climate risk management strategies are rather individuated by firms, and siloed across sectors. A lack of shared, accessible knowledge on climate risks to real estate and infrastructure hinders coordinated, transparent, and integrated decision-making. This highlights the need for structured transdisciplinary approaches that foster collaboration between researchers and practitioners to co-produce knowledge and develop integrated adaptation solutions.This article introduces a novel framework to facilitate transdisciplinary knowledge production for integrated real estate and infrastructure climate risk management. Combining institutionalized logics theory with AI-driven techniques, the framework comprises four interconnected phases: (1) knowledge elicitation, (2) knowledge exploration, (3) knowledge integration, and (4) knowledge transformation. Using a mixed-method approach, the framework is developed through a literature review on transdisciplinary research, and further evolved by incorporating empirical insights and experiential learning gained while applying it within the Red&Blue (Real Estate Development and Building in Low Urban Environments) research program. Applying the framework to the Red&Blue case study reveals that effective transdisciplinary knowledge production requires not only a structured process but also an adaptive, and iterative approach. Key enablers include sustained stakeholders engagement, safe-space dialogue, conscious knowledge integration, and integrative leadership. These elements foster trust, improve communication, and support the co-creation of actionable and transferable knowledge to address complex climate risk and sustainability challenges in urbanized built environments in the Netherlands and beyond.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种新的跨学科知识生产框架，结合制度逻辑理论和AI技术，通过四个阶段促进房地产和基础设施气候风险管理的知识整合与决策协调。
AI.research_question: 如何通过跨学科知识生产框架促进房地产和基础设施气候风险管理的整合决策？
AI.motivation: 气候变化对低洼、人口密集地区（如荷兰）的建筑环境造成严重影响，但目前的风险管理策略分散且缺乏共享知识，亟需跨学科协作。
AI.theoretical_framework: 制度逻辑理论与AI驱动技术。
AI.method: 混合方法，包括文献综述和实证研究（Red&Blue项目）。
AI.findings: 有效的跨学科知识生产需要结构化流程和适应性迭代方法，关键因素包括持续利益相关者参与、安全对话空间、知识整合意识和综合领导力。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了结合制度逻辑和AI技术的跨学科知识生产框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为荷兰及其他地区的城市化建筑环境提供了应对气候风险和可持续性挑战的可操作知识。

title: A Framework for Designing Domain-Specific, Data-Driven Ai Systems: Illustrated Through Sustainable Waste Management
affiliations: North Carolina State University, North Carolina State University, North Carolina State University, North Carolina State University, IBM and North Carolina State University - Department of Forest Biomaterials

detail.title: A Framework for Designing Domain-Specific, Data-Driven Ai Systems: Illustrated Through Sustainable Waste Management
detail.abstract: The rapid integration of artificial intelligence (AI) into diverse sectors has revealed a critical gap in systematic, domain-aware design methodologies for AI-based systems. This paper presents a structured framework for designing data-driven, domain-specific AI systems, emphasizing modularity, adaptability, and trade-off analysis. The approach is grounded in a feedback-driven process that aligns stakeholder goals with architectural components across multiple system layers. Key contributions include a method for translating domain constraints into actionable system requirements and a strategy for navigating design decisions through criteria such as latency, scalability, maintainability, and cost. The framework is instantiated in the context of municipal solid waste management, where it supports real-time classification and dataset generation, and is further evaluated across additional domains to demonstrate generalizability. This work offers a principled foundation for AI system architects and highlights future opportunities for automation using large language models, reinforcement learning, and digital twins.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种结构化框架，用于设计数据驱动的、领域特定的AI系统，强调模块化、适应性和权衡分析。该方法基于反馈驱动过程，将利益相关者目标与多层系统架构组件对齐。

AI.theoretical_framework: 反馈驱动过程、模块化设计、权衡分析。
AI.method: 提出结构化框架，将领域约束转化为可操作的系统需求，并通过延迟、可扩展性、可维护性和成本等标准指导设计决策。
AI.findings: 框架在市政固体废物管理中得到实例化，支持实时分类和数据集生成，并在其他领域验证了通用性。
AI.theory_contributions: 为AI系统设计提供了理论基础，强调反馈驱动和模块化。
AI.practical_contributions: 为AI系统架构师提供实用框架，并展示了在废物管理等领域的应用潜力。

title: The Competitive Advantage of ESG in Smes: A Cross-Case Analysis
affiliations: University of Rome Tor Vergata

detail.title: The Competitive Advantage of ESG in Smes: A Cross-Case Analysis
detail.abstract: This thesis explores whether Environmental, Social, and Governance principles, when completely implemented, can serve as a source of competitive advantage for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). While ESG has often been discussed in the context of corporate responsibility and compliance, this research adopts a strategic perspective, studying its role for differentiation, innovation, and stakeholder trust. Starting from the theoretical contributions of Porter, Teece, and Freeman, the analysis employs a qualitative multiple-case approach, examining Too Good To Go, Veja, and Nestlé for the comparison of ESG integration across different firm sizes and maturity levels. The findings reveal a contrast between ESG as a foundational business logic in SMEs and its fragmented implementation in larger corporations. Additionally, the research shows that the strategic effectiveness of ESG depends not only on internal commitment but also on external support, regulatory coherence, and transparency mechanisms. Ultimately, the thesis demonstrates that ESG can be more than a compliance exercise: it is a transformative tool for sustainable growth, particularly for agile, mission-driven enterprises willing to align purpose with performance.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了完全实施ESG原则是否能成为中小企业的竞争优势，发现ESG不仅是合规工具，更是可持续增长的变革性工具。
AI.research_question: 完全实施的ESG原则是否能成为中小企业的竞争优势？
AI.motivation: ESG通常被讨论为责任与合规问题，本研究从战略角度探讨其对差异化、创新和利益相关者信任的作用。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于Porter、Teece和Freeman的理论贡献。
AI.method: 采用定性多案例研究，分析Too Good To Go、Veja和Nestlé的ESG整合情况。
AI.findings: ESG在中小企业中是核心商业逻辑，而在大企业中则呈现碎片化实施；其战略效果依赖于内部承诺、外部支持、监管一致性和透明度机制。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证ESG不仅是合规工具，更是可持续增长的变革性工具。
AI.practical_contributions: 为中小企业提供通过ESG实现差异化与增长的实践路径。

title: Leadership for Positive Peace: Transforming Societies through Inclusion and Empathy
affiliations: Booz Allen Hamilton and Daniel K. Inouye Asia-Pacific Center for Security Studies

detail.title: Leadership for Positive Peace: Transforming Societies through Inclusion and Empathy
detail.abstract: Empathy and inclusion are transformative forces capable of healing nations, bridging divides, and fostering lasting peace. This chapter explores the leadership of Atifete Jahjaga, Kosovo’s first female president, and Jacinda Ardern, New Zealand’s former prime minister, who embodied these qualities while addressing systemic injustices, societal traumas, and national crises. Jahjaga championed institutional reform and reconciliation in the wake of conflict, confronting stigma and empowering marginalized voices. Ardern united her nation with compassionate and decisive leadership, particularly during the Christchurch mosque attacks and the COVID-19 pandemic. Their stories demonstrate the power of Positive Peace principles to inspire resilience, equity, and collective progress in an uncertain world.

AI.tldr: 本章探讨了科索沃首位女总统阿蒂费特·亚希亚加和新西兰前总理杰辛达·阿德恩的领导力，她们通过同理心和包容性应对系统性不公、社会创伤和国家危机，展现了积极和平原则的力量。
AI.research_question: 同理心和包容性如何通过领导力促进国家和平与社会进步？
AI.motivation: 探讨领导力在应对系统性不公、社会创伤和国家危机中的作用，以期为全球和平与进步提供启示。
AI.theoretical_framework: 积极和平原则（Positive Peace principles）。
AI.method: 通过案例研究分析阿蒂费特·亚希亚加和杰辛达·阿德恩的领导实践。
AI.findings: 两位领导人的同理心和包容性领导风格在促进国家和平、社会韧性和集体进步方面发挥了关键作用。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了积极和平原则在领导力领域的应用，强调了同理心和包容性的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为全球领导者提供了应对危机和促进社会和谐的实践启示。

title: How do Economic Factors Affect Life Expectancy in Iran?
affiliations: Islamic Azad University (IAU) - Economics and Accounting College and Islamic Azad University (IAU) - Economics and Accounting College

detail.title: How do Economic Factors Affect Life Expectancy in Iran?

declarations.declarationOfInterest: The authors declare that they have no conflicts of interest.
declarations.funderStatement: This research did not receive any specific grant from funding agencies in the public, commercial, or not-for-profit sectors.

detail.abstract: Background: This study investigates the empirical relationship between key macroeconomic variables and public health in Iran, using life expectancy at birth as a proxy for the public health index over the period 1984-2023. Methods: Annual data on inflation rate, unemployment rate, per capita gross domestic product (at current prices), the share of health expenditures in GDP, and urbanization rate were collected from reputable domestic and international sources. Short-and long-term relationships were assessed using the Autoregressive Distributed Lag (ARDL) model and the Bounds Test. The speed of adjustment was evaluated through the error correction model (ECM), and causality relationships were explored using relevant statistical tests. Results: The findings indicate that inflation and unemployment rates exert significant negative effects on life expectancy, while per capita income and the share of health expenditures in GDP positively influence public health outcomes. The error correction term suggests a relatively rapid adjustment of the health index to equilibrium after economic shocks. Causality tests demonstrate that macroeconomic variables predominantly drive changes in the public health index. Conclusions: Effective and sustainable inflation control, targeted labor market support, and increasing the share of health expenditures in GDP are critical policy recommendations for improving community health. Future research is encouraged to utilize provincial panel data, integrate environmental and social variables, and employ nonlinear models to further elucidate the complex interactions between macroeconomic factors and public health.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了伊朗宏观经济变量与公共健康的实证关系，发现通胀和失业率对预期寿命有显著负面影响，而人均收入和卫生支出占比则对公共健康有积极影响。
AI.research_question: 宏观经济变量如何影响伊朗的公共健康？
AI.motivation: 研究旨在揭示宏观经济因素对公共健康的影响，为政策制定提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于ARDL模型和Bounds Test的宏观经济与公共健康关系理论。
AI.method: 使用ARDL模型、Bounds Test、误差修正模型（ECM）和因果关系检验分析年度数据。
AI.findings: 通胀和失业率对预期寿命有负面影响，人均收入和卫生支出占比对公共健康有正面影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了宏观经济变量对公共健康的长期和短期影响机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出控制通胀、支持劳动力市场和增加卫生支出占比的政策建议。

title: The Analysis of Two-Way E-Commerce Credit Evaluation Model Based on the C2C Mode
affiliations: Fuzhou University of International Studies and Trade, Hunan University, Erasmus University Rotterdam and Guizhou Light Industry Technical College

detail.title: The Analysis of Two-Way E-Commerce Credit Evaluation Model Based on the C2C Mode
detail.abstract: As an important mode of e-commerce, C2C has become a trading mechanism favored by consumers. However, for C2C transaction in a virtual environment, there is an issue of congenital transaction asymmetry, leading to increased uncertainties and transaction risks as well as credit speculation, false transactions, and other credit problems. These problems not only affect the development of enterprises to a large extent, but also hinder the development of e-commerce ultimately. In order to guarantee the safety of both transaction parties, it is particularly important to establish a sound credit evaluation system for shopping sites. Through the analysis of the shortcomings of the existing C2C e-commerce credit evaluation model, this paper proposes a two-way e-commerce credit evaluation model based on the C2C mode. Firstly, a cross-platform two-way credit rating center with a unified rating standard was constructed; secondly, the credit evaluation indicator was reset and revised; then the credit rating of buyers and sellers was unified by combining fuzzy comprehensive evaluation algorithm.

AI.tldr: 本文针对C2C电子商务中的信用问题，提出了一种基于模糊综合评价算法的双向信用评价模型，以解决现有信用评价模型的不足。
AI.research_question: 如何通过改进信用评价模型解决C2C电子商务中的信用问题？
AI.motivation: C2C电子商务中的信用问题（如交易不对称、信用投机等）影响了企业和电子商务的发展，亟需建立完善的信用评价体系。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于模糊综合评价算法的信用评价理论。
AI.method: 1. 构建跨平台双向信用评级中心；2. 重置和修订信用评价指标；3. 结合模糊综合评价算法统一买卖双方信用评级。
AI.findings: 提出了一个改进的双向信用评价模型，能够更有效地解决C2C电子商务中的信用问题。
AI.theory_contributions: 扩展了信用评价理论在C2C电子商务中的应用，提出了基于模糊综合评价的双向信用评价方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为C2C电子商务平台提供了更完善的信用评价体系，有助于降低交易风险，促进电子商务发展。

title: Artificial Intelligence and Firm-Level Productivity: Early Evidence from a Small Open Economy
affiliations: Economic and Social Research Institute (ESRI) Dublin and Economic and Social Research Institute (ESRI)

detail.title: Artificial Intelligence and Firm-Level Productivity: Early Evidence from a Small Open Economy
detail.abstract: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is a modern general-purpose technology (GPT) with the potential to enhance the productivity of firms in every sector of the economy. Notwithstanding the growing interest in AI as a new source of productivity growth, evidence on firm-level productivity gains from using AI is scarce. This paper contributes to filling this evidence gap by estimating an augmented production function model using linked firm-level data from Ireland over 2019- 2023. To identify a causal effect of AI on firm productivity, we exploit variation of the adoption of AI across industries and use an instrumental variable (IV) empirical approach. Our results indicate that using AI and the intensity of using AI across business areas have positive effects on firm level productivity over and above other capital and labour inputs and controlling for unobserved industry-specific effects. The effect of using AI on productivity is larger and the relationship is stronger when conditioned on other factors that influence firm-level productivity including skills, age, foreign ownership, digital skills and unobserved industry-specific effects.

AI.tldr: 本文通过爱尔兰2019-2023年的企业级数据，估计了增强生产函数模型，发现AI的使用及其强度对企业生产率有积极影响，且这种影响在控制其他因素后更为显著。
AI.research_question: AI的使用及其强度如何影响企业层面的生产率？
AI.motivation: 尽管AI被视为提升生产率的新来源，但企业层面关于AI对生产率影响的实证证据稀缺。
AI.theoretical_framework: 增强生产函数模型，工具变量（IV）实证方法。
AI.method: 利用爱尔兰2019-2023年的企业级数据，采用工具变量（IV）方法估计AI对生产率的因果效应。
AI.findings: AI的使用及其强度对企业生产率有积极影响，且这种影响在控制其他因素（如技能、年龄、外资所有权等）后更为显著。
AI.theory_contributions: 填补了AI对企业生产率影响的实证证据空白，验证了AI作为通用技术（GPT）的生产率提升潜力。
AI.practical_contributions: 为企业决策者提供了AI投资对生产率提升的具体证据，支持AI在商业领域的广泛应用。

title: What To Mean by “Fair” in Europe’s Fair Share Debate?
affiliations: Corvinus University of Budapest

detail.title: What To Mean by “Fair” in Europe’s Fair Share Debate?
detail.abstract: In the European Union, a heated debate has emerged about whether the current practice of network neutrality regulation might endanger the development of very high-capacity networks and thus threaten the competitiveness of the European telecommunications sector. Operators insist that large content providers, who are effectively free riding on operator infrastructure, should be required to contribute a “fair share” of the costs of delivering their content; they believe new policies should facilitate this. Yet in most policy discussions, “fairness” appears as a purely rhetorical concept, seldom accompanied by concrete methods of quantification. Many policy recommendations suggest that cost shares should be bargained by operators and content providers, and regulators should step in if negotiations are not successful. Although this paper does not take a position on either side of the debate, by employing a cooperative game-theoretic framework it seeks to clarify what “fair share” could mean in rigorous economic terms. My theoretical model builds on the externality created by content providers originating large volumes of internet traffic, who do not pay for and have no incentive to limit the resulting infrastructure costs. Central to our cooperative framework is the hypothetical “grand coalition,” in which all players (operators, content providers, and consumers) cooperate to maximize a joint surplus, thereby fully internalizing this externality. Hypothetical coalitions, including only part of the players, might also partially reduce it. Each coalition’s value is defined in its ability to mitigate the externality, and each player’s contribution to that mitigation provides a basis for allocating costs. I rely on the Shapley value to examine how operators, content providers, and consumers should share traffic-generated costs under this widely used conception of fairness. My results suggest that, according to the Shapley value, operators and content providers should split costs equally, leaving no direct burden on consumers. In the case of multiple competing operators, their half of the cost should be further split between them equally. The model aims for ease of practical implementation; hence, the suggested share measures depend only on observable cost parameters. With such a cost-sharing regulation in place, and taken into account by players in their optimization, the market equilibrium shifts closer to the social optimum, infrastructure deployment rises, and at high infrastructure cost levels, both consumer surplus and total welfare improve.

AI.tldr: 本文通过合作博弈理论框架，探讨了欧盟网络中立性监管中“公平份额”的经济学定义，提出运营商和内容提供商应平分成本，消费者无需直接承担。
AI.research_question: 在网络中立性监管背景下，如何从经济学角度定义和量化“公平份额”？
AI.motivation: 当前关于网络中立性的讨论中，“公平”概念缺乏量化方法，本文旨在填补这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于合作博弈理论，特别是“大联盟”假设和Shapley值。
AI.method: 构建理论模型，分析运营商、内容提供商和消费者在成本分摊中的角色。
AI.findings: 根据Shapley值，运营商和内容提供商应平分成本，消费者无需直接承担；多运营商时成本进一步均分。
AI.theory_contributions: 为“公平份额”提供了经济学定义和量化方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出易于实施的成本分摊方案，有助于市场均衡和社会福利提升。

title: Broadband Resilience by Zero Trust Community Network Policy Design
affiliations: Syracuse University iSchool and Syracuse University

detail.title: Broadband Resilience by Zero Trust Community Network Policy Design
detail.abstract: Nations depend on digital connectivity for innovation, economic growth, emergency response, public safety, public health, and other critical societal functions, making the resilience of telecommunications and Internet infrastructure a critical policy concern. The 9/11 Commission (2004) identified communication gaps as a key failure and recommended a nationwide high-speed network for first responders, leading to the creation of FirstNet a decade later in 2012. However, centralized networks remain vulnerable to disruptions with single points of failure, as demonstrated by the innumerable outages and data breaches affecting all networks and services, occasionally affecting FirstNet itself. Using mixed research methods, this paper employs qualitative policy and quantitative survey data analysis to evaluate the potential effectiveness of decentralized, Zero Trust models in improving network resilience. It draws on academic research and empirical case studies to assess whether decentralized, community-driven networks can mitigate occurrences and impacts of cyberattacks and network misconfigurations, and the impacts of environmental disasters. This paper concludes that decentralized, community-operated telecommunications networks can augment traditional network models and enhance resilience against cyber threats and environmental disasters. By distributing network control across multiple localized nodes, decentralized architectures mitigate single points of failure often exploited by cybercriminals and nation-state adversaries.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了分散式、零信任模型在提升电信和互联网基础设施韧性方面的潜力，通过混合研究方法评估其在应对网络攻击和环境灾害中的有效性。
AI.research_question: 分散式、社区驱动的网络能否有效减少网络攻击和配置错误的频率及影响，并提升对环境灾害的韧性？
AI.motivation: 集中式网络存在单点故障风险，多次网络中断和数据泄露事件表明其脆弱性，亟需探索更韧性的替代方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 零信任模型和分散式网络架构理论。
AI.method: 采用混合研究方法，结合定性政策分析和定量调查数据分析。
AI.findings: 分散式、社区运营的电信网络能有效减少单点故障，增强对网络威胁和环境灾害的韧性。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了分散式网络在提升基础设施韧性方面的理论可行性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了分散式网络作为集中式网络补充的实际建议。

title: Align and Accelerate Nations ESG Leadership Efforts With Implementation of SDG17 Partnership Effects
affiliations: Swiss School Of Business and Management

detail.title: Align and Accelerate Nations ESG Leadership Efforts With Implementation of SDG17 Partnership Effects
detail.abstract:
This dissertation examines the critical role of Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) leadership in advancing Sustainable Development Goal 17 (SDG17) implementation, focusing on partnerships and collaborative strategies to achieve sustainable development in OECD and vulnerable nations. Targeting high-level managers, dynamic governance officials, and ESG strategists, the study provides actionable insights for aligning national policies with SDG17 objectives to foster a sustainable future. Through a comprehensive analysis of ESG and SDG midpoint assessments, the dissertation identifies gaps in nations’ implementation strategies, particularly in vulnerable countries, where the absence of robust partnerships and coordinated management hinders progress toward the 17 SDG targets.

The research reveals that most nations have faced significant setbacks in achieving SDG goals due to deficiencies in ESG leadership and inadequate collaboration frameworks. Despite decades of guidance from the United Nations, the lack of visionary ESG leaders and insufficient coordination among nations has led to widespread failures in meeting sustainability targets. The study highlights that only a few OECD nations demonstrate exemplary ESG governance, serving as models for others. To address these challenges, the dissertation proposes a transformative framework that emphasizes accelerated ESG programs, capacity building, and cross-national partnerships to remediate lagging indicators and promote sustainable human development.

Key findings underscore the necessity of aligning ESG leadership with SDG17’s focus on partnerships, technology, trade, systemic policy reforms, capacity building, and innovative financial mechanisms. These elements are identified as critical catalysts for reducing the burden on future ESG leaders and ensuring resilient progress in vulnerable nations. The dissertation advocates for the training and development of ESG visionaries by leading SDG nations to empower lagging countries, fostering uncompromised progress toward sustainability. It also introduces a novel approach to meta-mapping national ESG pathways, incorporating Gross National Happiness (GNH) as an accelerator to prioritize human-centric sustainability goals.

The study emphasizes urgent priorities for vulnerable nations, including climate adaptation, sustainable fisheries, and addressing violence against children. It further advocates for agricultural innovation, self-sufficient community gardens, and nutrition programs to combat hunger and improve health outcomes. The dissertation calls for advanced tools, such as online training platforms, to cultivate future ESG leaders equipped to tackle SDG challenges. It also recommends further research into universal healthcare access and measurement of unmet health needs to ensure equitable progress.

In conclusion, this dissertation provides a strategic roadmap for nations to overcome SDG implementation challenges by strengthening ESG leadership and fostering global partnerships. By prioritizing SDG17’s collaborative framework and integrating innovative tools and policies, nations can accelerate progress toward the 2030 Agenda, ensuring a sustainable and equitable future for all.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了ESG领导力在推动可持续发展目标17（SDG17）实施中的关键作用，重点关注OECD国家和脆弱国家通过合作策略实现可持续发展的路径。研究发现，ESG领导力不足和合作框架缺失是阻碍SDG目标实现的主要因素，并提出了一套转型框架以加速可持续发展。
AI.research_question: ESG领导力如何推动SDG17的实施，特别是在OECD和脆弱国家中？
AI.motivation: 尽管联合国提供了多年指导，但许多国家在实现SDG目标方面进展缓慢，尤其是脆弱国家。本研究旨在填补ESG领导力和合作策略在SDG实施中的研究空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究基于ESG（环境、社会和治理）理论和SDG17（可持续发展目标17）的合作框架。
AI.method: 通过综合分析ESG和SDG的中期评估数据，识别国家实施策略中的差距。
AI.findings: 研究发现，大多数国家因ESG领导力不足和合作框架缺失而在SDG目标实现中受阻。少数OECD国家展示了良好的ESG治理模式。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了一个转型框架，强调加速ESG计划、能力建设和跨国合作。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了行动建议，包括培训ESG领导者、推广创新金融机制和优先考虑人类福祉的可持续发展目标。

publicationDetails.detailsText: Columbia Business School Research Paper Forthcoming

detail.abstract: Factor investing, which involves targeting specific risk factors to enhance portfolio returns, has transformed modern portfolio construction. This paper explores the theoretical foundations, empirical evidence, and practical applications of factor investing. We review the evolution of factor investing from the Capital Asset Pricing Model (CAPM) to multi-factor models, including academic studies and industry practices. The paper also addresses challenges, including factor crowding, timing, and implementation costs.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了因子投资的理论基础、实证证据及实际应用，从CAPM到多因子模型的演变，并讨论了因子拥挤、时机选择和实施成本等挑战。
AI.research_question: 因子投资如何通过针对特定风险因子提升投资组合回报？
AI.motivation: 因子投资改变了现代投资组合构建方式，但面临诸多挑战，需系统梳理其理论与实践。

AI.theory_contributions: 系统梳理因子投资的理论演变，为未来研究提供框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为投资者提供因子投资的实践指南，并指出潜在挑战。

title: The Impact of the Internal Pay Gap on Enterprise Value Creation: The Moderating Effect of Digital Transformation
affiliations: Hefei University of Technology - School of Management, Hefei University of Technology, Hefei University of Technology, Hefei University of Technology - School of Management, Hefei University of Technology and Hefei University of Technology

detail.title: The Impact of the Internal Pay Gap on Enterprise Value Creation: The Moderating Effect of Digital Transformation
detail.abstract: Conflicts of interest between executives and employees have intensified, exacerbating tensions between internal value distribution fairness and value creation coordination. Balancing fairness and efficiency has become a persistent dilemma. Digital transformation offers potential opportunitConflicts of interest between executives and employees have intensified, exacerbating tensions between internal value distribution fairness and value creation coordination. Balancing fairness and efficiency has become a persistent dilemma. Digital transformation offers potential opportunities for solving this problem, but research is needed to determine whether significant changes result and the underlying mechanisms of their impact. Using data from China’s A-share listed firms from 2013–2022, this study examines the impact of the internal pay gap on value creation and the moderating role of digital transformation. The findings reveal an inverted U-shaped relationship between the first two factors. A heterogeneity analysis indicates that this relationship varies significantly across business ownership types, enterprise sizes, regions, industries, and levels of digital transformation. A further analysis shows that digital transformation moderates this inverted U-shaped relationship in two ways. First, it steepens the curve, increasing the sensitivity of employees' pay-to-performance linkage. Second, it shifts the turning point leftward, decreasing the overall internal pay gap and advancing the optimal incentive threshold. By decomposing the pay structure, this study finds that digital transformation narrows the reasonable pay gap while widening the excessive pay gap, creating positive incentives for both employees and executives. Using data from China’s A-share listed firms from 2013–2022, this study examines the impact of the internal pay gap on value creation and the moderating role of digital transformation. The findings reveal an inverted U-shaped relationship between the first two factors. title: Does Size Matter? The Effect of Text Length On(Financial) Outcomes

detail.abstract: The increasing availability of unstructured financial text has created new opportunities for natural language processing (NLP) in economics and finance. This paper reviews developments in NLP for long financial documents, highlighting the challenges posed by document length, structure, and domain-specific language. We discuss current approaches, including semantic similarity, contextual embeddings, and topic modeling, and conclude with an illustrative application of Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) to business plans.

detail.title: Branch Network Overlap and Bank Cost Efficiency
detail.abstract: This paper investigates the relationship between bank branch network overlap and banks’ cost efficiency. We propose an overlap measure that captures the overall degree of overlap in bank branch networks, extending existing pairwise measures to a multi-bank framework. We find that banks with greater network overlap exhibit higher cost efficiency. Mechanism analyses suggest that banks can benefit from economies of scale facilitated by spatial proximity. Our findings extend the application of scale economy theories to banking and provide practical implications for decision-making in branch openness and closure.

title: Risk Exposure and the Legitimacy of Unequal Leader Pay: Experimental Evidence
affiliations: University of Texas at Dallas - School of Management - Department of Finance & Managerial Economics

detail.title: Risk Exposure and the Legitimacy of Unequal Leader Pay: Experimental Evidence
detail.abstract: We investigate whether exposing leaders to downside risk can legitimize large pay disparities between leaders and team members. In a laboratory experiment, leaders and followers repeatedly play a weakest-link coordination game, with leaders moving first. When successful coordination yields disproportionately high rewards for leaders, effort is reduced and team performance deteriorates. By contrast, when leaders also bear more substantial strategic risk---in the form of larger losses if coordination fails---team performance initially improves. Leaders appear to trust that assuming such risk will be seen as a motivational act that restores the legitimacy of pay inequality and encourages others to follow. Yet this effect proves difficult to sustain, as coordination often unravels even after the efficient outcome has been reached. We conclude that while risk-based legitimacy can support coordination under inequality, the greater challenge lies in sustaining it.

detail.abstract: The Registered Behavior Technician (RBT) credential plays a crucial role in shaping competent paraprofessionals in the field of Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA). As the demand for qualified RBTs grows, so does the need for effective preparatory strategies. This research paper explores the significance of RBT practice exams as a pedagogical tool to enhance student performance. Through a comprehensive literature review, user data analysis, and expert commentary, the paper argues that structured practice exams significantly improve retention, reduce test anxiety, and increase passing rates. The findings support the integration of digital mock exam platforms, into ABA training programs to strengthen student readiness for certification.

detail.title: Brand Capital and Trade Credit Policy
detail.abstract: We proxy for customer awareness and perception of firms' range and types of products/services to examinine the relation between a firm’s brand capital and its trade credit policies. We find that firms with higher stock of brand capital increase their use of supplier credit while decreasing extension of customer credit. These effects are more pronounced in firms facing higher financing constraints and those operating in a higher product market competition environment. We also document the impact of brand capital on working capital management. Overall, this study provides evidence that links brand capital with corporate trade credit policies and financing outcomes.

detail.abstract: Mental self-management. Theory of intellectual styles and their development To date, there is a large amount of literature on general intelligence and multiple intelligences. There are many samples that measure this dymenia, but data on mind management up to this point in which I read the article had not reached me. They were not interested in the first lines yet, so I decided to write a report on it. According to the author, intelligence depends on both external and internal causes. The external causes are the social reality, the prerequisites in which a person is realized, and the internal ones from the general intelligence and personality features. Data on the subject can be found in the works of Hobbes, Locke and Rousseau. Intelligence management is about how we orient it and what we use it for. The fact that several individuals are placed in the same environment does not mean that they will handle their crystallized intelligence in the same way. On the contrary, man's understandings, his desires and peculiarities will prompt him in one way or another to use his intelligence by his own methods. Exactly this is depicted by the example of the three roommates who have the same level of abilities, but are carried out in different areas of life. Mental self-management is defined as purpose, configuration, level, range, and aspiration.

title: Self: A Sequence Learning-Based Fourier Neural Operator for  Solving Time-Dependent Traffic Flow Models
affiliations: Southwestern University of Finance and Economics (SWUFE), Southwestern University of Finance and Economics (SWUFE), Southwestern University of Finance and Economics (SWUFE) and The University of Hong Kong

detail.title: Self: A Sequence Learning-Based Fourier Neural Operator for  Solving Time-Dependent Traffic Flow Models
detail.abstract: Traffic flow models are essential for modeling transportation systems in smart cities, but their accurate and efficient solution remains computationally challenging. While traditional numerical methods require repetitive computations for varying parameters, existing Fourier Neural Operators (FNO) struggle with long-term forecasting accuracy for time-dependent traffic-related partial differential equations. To address these limitations, we propose an innovative deep learning framework—a Sequential Learning-based Fourier Neural Operator (SELF). Specifically, SELF subdivides the time domain into non-overlapping sub-domains, assigning independent operator networks to each. Additionally, employing a sequential training strategy enables capturing dynamic changes in physical evolution from initial time steps, ensuring the model learns and comprehends unique features of each sub-domain and the complete temporal sequence. To further reduce training costs, a transfer learning method is introduced, leveraging optimal parameters and accumulated knowledge from prior training stages. Experiments on the Lighthill-Whitham-Richards (LWR) model show that SELF achieves a ​19% reduction in solution error​ and a ​67% decrease in training costs​ compared to vanilla FNO, demonstrating its efficacy for traffic flow initial and boundary value problems. By significantly improving computational efficiency and prediction accuracy, SELF provides a scalable and sustainable solution for smart city traffic management.

title: Displacement Prediction Method for Offshore Collaborative Operation Platforms Based on Real-Time Monitoring Data and Lstm-Pinn Transfer-Coupled Model
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Sun Yat-sen University (SYSU), affiliation not provided to SSRN, affiliation not provided to SSRN and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Displacement Prediction Method for Offshore Collaborative Operation Platforms Based on Real-Time Monitoring Data and Lstm-Pinn Transfer-Coupled Model
detail.abstract: During installation, operation, and maintenance phases, offshore platforms often require collaborative operations with vessels or other marine facilities. In this process, collision risk between platforms has become a critical concern in ocean engineering. The displacement of offshore platforms serves as a key indicator for collision risk early-warning. Although current numerical simulation models and data-driven deep learning methods provide high-precision displacement response predictions, they struggle with time-varying environmental conditions and fail to meet online early-warning requirements. To address this, this paper proposes an online displacement prediction method for offshore platforms based on real-time monitoring data and an LSTM-PINN (Long Short-Term Memory - Physics-Informed Neural Network) transfer-coupled model. We construct an LSTM-PINN-coupled source model for displacement prediction, optimize network parameters via Bayesian methods for deep learning training, and analyze pre-training results to demonstrate the reliability of the LSTM-PINN-coupled source model as a foundation for subsequent transfer learning. Furthermore, displacement transfer models under various environmental conditions are established, verifying the accuracy and superiority of LSTM-PINN transfer-coupled model predictions across different operating scenarios, thereby providing theoretical foundations and technical support for risk assessment.

title: Exact Results for Discrete-Time Tandem Queues with Server Interruptions
affiliations: affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Exact Results for Discrete-Time Tandem Queues with Server Interruptions
detail.abstract: In this paper, we study a tandem system of two discrete-time infinite-capacity single-server queues with deterministic service times of 1 time slot per customer. New arrivals enter the system only in the first queue, independently from slot to slot; the probability generating function (pgf) of the number of new arrivals per slot is indicated as A(z). The output process of the first queue constitutes the input process to the second queue. Both servers are (possibly) subject to mutually independent random server interruptions which occur independently from slot to slot; σ1 and σ2 indicate the probabilities that server 1 and server 2 are available during any slot.We first analyze the system contents (i.e., numbers of customers present) in both queues. As it is not impacted by the events in queue 2, the queue-1 system content can be analyzed quite straightforwardly. However, the system-content analysis of queue 2 and the whole tandem system is more complicated. We first prove that the system contents of both queues are mutually independent if and only if the arrival process is a Bernoulli process, i.e., A(z) = 1−λ+λz. For general arrival pgfs A(z), we establish a functional equation for the steady-state joint pgf of the two system contents, and we succeed to solve this equation explicitly if σ1 = 1 and/or σ2 = 1.The most challenging part of the paper is concerned with the analysis of the customer delays. Here, we develop a variety of different mathematical approaches to compute the steady-state pgfs of the delay of an arbitrary customer in queue 1, in queue 2, and in the whole tandem system. Exact closed-form results are obtained for two main cases: either arbitrary σ1 and σ2, combined with Bernoulli arrivals, or σ1 = 1 and/or σ2 = 1, in combination with general arrival pgfs A(z).

title: Optimizing Dc Fast Charger Placement Along Tourism Corridor Under Budget Constraints
affiliations: Michigan State University, Michigan State University, Michigan State University, Michigan State University, Michigan State University and Michigan State University

detail.title: Optimizing Dc Fast Charger Placement Along Tourism Corridor Under Budget Constraints
detail.abstract: With the rise in electric vehicle (EV) adoption, enabling long-distance EV travel along scenic routes offers a promising path to boost regional tourism and expand EV use beyond urban areas. However, limited driving range and insufficient charging infrastructure remain significant barriers to widespread adoption for touristic travel. Launched in 2022, the Lake Michigan Circuit initiative aims to expand charging infrastructure along the coastline. This study presents an optimization framework for siting and sizing DC Fast Charging stations, accounting for budget constraints, EV user behavior, stochastic queuing delays, and real-world grid upgrade costs. To model flexible EV user behavior during tourism trips, a charging station assignment algorithm is proposed using a buffer range that includes multiple charging options. A Modified Constrained Simulated Annealing (MCSA) algorithm is introduced, which decomposes the problem into location and sizing subproblems and incorporates a dynamic penalty method for constraint handling. MCSA’s performance is benchmarked against a Genetic Algorithm (GA) and validated through implicit enumeration on a small-scale case study. Results demonstrate that MCSA can yield higher-quality solutions with reduced runtime and computational effort. Comprehensive sensitivity analyses explore the effects of budget limits, charger power levels, and user behavior assumptions. Findings show that while lower budgets increase queuing time and reduce charger availability, a minimum number of stations is required to ensure trip feasibility. Also, 150 kW chargers offer the best performance under limited available funding. The study underscores the importance of calibrating EV user charging behavior, as behavioral assumptions significantly impact infrastructure configuration and investment requirements.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种优化框架，用于在预算限制、用户行为和电网升级成本等约束下，规划和设计DC快速充电站，以支持电动汽车在旅游路线上的长途旅行。
AI.research_question: 如何在预算限制和用户行为约束下，优化DC快速充电站的选址和规模，以支持电动汽车在旅游路线上的长途旅行？
AI.motivation: 电动汽车在旅游路线上的长途旅行面临续航里程和充电基础设施不足的挑战，亟需优化充电站布局以促进区域旅游和电动汽车普及。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究基于优化理论和随机排队模型，结合用户行为假设和电网升级成本。
AI.method: 提出了一种改进的约束模拟退火算法（MCSA），用于分解选址和规模问题，并通过动态惩罚方法处理约束。
AI.findings: MCSA在解决方案质量和计算效率上优于遗传算法；150 kW充电器在有限预算下表现最佳；用户行为假设对基础设施配置有显著影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了MCSA算法，为充电站优化问题提供了新的求解方法。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和充电基础设施规划者提供了优化充电站布局的具体建议，尤其是在预算有限的情况下。

title: Cybersecurity Risk and Bank Competition
affiliations: Universiti Sultan Zainal Abidin, Universiti Sultan Zainal Abidin (UniSZA), Universiti Sultan Zainal Abidin, Terengganu, Malaysia and University of Ghana - University of Ghana Business School (UGBS)

detail.title: Cybersecurity Risk and Bank Competition
detail.abstract: This paper examines the impact of  cybersecurity risk on bank competition in the United States. Using a comprehensive dataset of 10,274 bank-year observations from 1995 to 2024,we construct a novel cybersecurity risk index through textual analysis of the risk factor sections in the banks’ 10-K filings. Our baseline results reveal a  significant positive relationship between cybersecurity risk and bank competition. To address endogeneity concerns, we employ instrumental variable approach, dynamic Difference-in-Differences, Propensity Score Matching, and Entropy Balancing methods. Next, we explore the mechanisms through which cyber risk drives bank  competition and find that the effect is stronger for banks with high earnings volatility, elevated funding costs, and unstable deposit growth. Cross-sectional results show that smaller, riskier, and operationally constrained banks are more exposed to competitive pressures under heightened cyber threats. Overall, our findings provide novel insights for managers and policymakers navigating the digital banking landscape.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了网络安全风险对美国银行竞争的影响，通过构建新的网络安全风险指数，发现两者呈显著正相关关系，并通过多种方法验证了结果的稳健性。
AI.research_question: 网络安全风险如何影响美国银行的竞争？
AI.motivation: 随着数字化银行的发展，网络安全风险对银行竞争的影响尚未被充分研究，本文填补了这一空白。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于银行竞争理论和网络安全风险理论。
AI.method: 使用10-K文件文本分析构建网络安全风险指数，并采用工具变量法、动态双重差分、倾向得分匹配和熵平衡方法。
AI.findings: 网络安全风险与银行竞争呈显著正相关，且对盈利波动性高、融资成本高、存款增长不稳定的银行影响更大。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了银行竞争与网络安全风险的理论联系。
AI.practical_contributions: 为银行管理者和政策制定者在数字化银行环境中提供了新的决策依据。

title: Semi-on-Demand Hybrid Transit Route Design with Shared Autonomous Mobility Services
affiliations: Northwestern University, affiliation not provided to SSRN, Northwestern University and Technische Universität München (TUM)

detail.title: Semi-on-Demand Hybrid Transit Route Design with Shared Autonomous Mobility Services
detail.abstract: Shared Autonomous Vehicles (SAVs) enable transit agencies to design more agile and responsive services at lower operating costs. This study designs and evaluates a semi-on-demand hybrid route directional service in the public transit network, offering on-demand flexible route service in low-density areas and fixed route service in higher-density areas. We develop analytically tractable cost expressions that capture access, waiting, and riding costs for users, and distance-based operating and time-based vehicle costs for operators. Two formulations are presented for strategic and tactical decisions in flexible route portion, fleet size, headway, and vehicle size optimization, enabling the determination of route types between fixed, hybrid, and flexible routes based on demand, cost, and operational parameters. Analytical results demonstrate that the lower operating costs of SAVs favor more flexible route services. The practical applications and benefits of semi-on-demand feeders are presented with numerical examples and a large-scale case study in the Chicago metropolitan area. Findings reveal scenarios in which flexible route portions serving passengers located further away reduce total costs, particularly user costs, whereas higher demand densities favor more traditional line-based operations. On two studied lines and a large-scale case study in the Chicago metropolitan area, USA, current cost forecasts suggest smaller vehicles with fully flexible routes are optimal, but operating constraints or higher operating costs would favor larger vehicles with hybrid routes. The study provides an analytical tool to design SAVs as directional services and transit feeders, and tractable continuous approximation formulations for planning and research in transit network design.

AI.tldr: 本研究设计并评估了一种半按需混合路线定向服务，结合低密度区域的灵活路线和高密度区域的固定路线，利用共享自动驾驶车辆（SAVs）降低运营成本。通过分析模型和案例研究（芝加哥都市区），发现灵活路线在特定场景下可显著降低成本。
AI.research_question: 如何在公共交通网络中设计一种半按需混合路线定向服务，以优化用户和运营商的成本？
AI.motivation: 共享自动驾驶车辆（SAVs）为公共交通提供了更灵活、低成本的运营方式，但需平衡灵活性与传统固定路线的效率。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于成本分析的理论框架，包括用户（访问、等待、乘坐成本）和运营商（距离和时间成本）的成本模型。
AI.method: 开发可分析的成本表达式，提出战略和战术决策模型，结合数值案例和大规模研究（芝加哥都市区）。
AI.findings: 灵活路线在低密度区域可降低总成本，而高密度区域更适合传统固定路线；小型车辆和完全灵活路线在特定条件下最优。
AI.theory_contributions: 提供了设计SAVs定向服务的分析工具和连续近似公式，支持交通网络规划研究。
AI.practical_contributions: 为公共交通机构提供半按需混合路线的设计方法，优化运营成本和用户体验。

title: Measuring Customer Satisfaction with E-Commerce Convenience Services: A Kano Model-Based Approach
affiliations: Hungarian University of Agriculture and Life Sciences, affiliation not provided to SSRN and Hungarian University of Agriculture and Life Sciences

detail.title: Measuring Customer Satisfaction with E-Commerce Convenience Services: A Kano Model-Based Approach
detail.abstract: The aim of this study is to examine convenience services in last-mile logistics through the application of the Kano model. In terms of methodology, we employ a revised and refined version of the Kano model, which provides more accurate and better-aligned responses. The data were collected via a consumer questionnaire survey. The primary objective of the study is to identify those last-mile and e-commerce factors that significantly influence customer satisfaction. Based on the responses, it can be clearly concluded that among the convenience services, the use of a preferred payment method and online tracking are essential (One-Dimensional) factors. Time-based delivery options, environmentally friendly and sustainability-oriented services, as well as flexibility-related features, represent Attractive qualities that can play a crucial role in winning customer orders. Forward-looking innovations, from the consumer’s perspective, are not yet fully developed and are perceived as Indifferent attributes—meaning their presence or absence does not alter the perceived quality of the service.

AI.tldr: 本研究通过改进的Kano模型分析最后一公里物流中的便利服务，发现首选支付方式和在线跟踪是基本需求，而时间交付选项和环保服务是吸引因素，前瞻性创新则被视为无关因素。
AI.research_question: 最后一公里物流和电子商务中哪些因素显著影响客户满意度？
AI.motivation: 探索便利服务对客户满意度的影响，以优化最后一公里物流服务。
AI.theoretical_framework: 改进的Kano模型。
AI.method: 消费者问卷调查。
AI.findings: 首选支付方式和在线跟踪是基本需求（一维因素），时间交付选项和环保服务是吸引因素，前瞻性创新被视为无关因素。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了改进的Kano模型在物流服务中的适用性，并扩展了客户满意度理论。
AI.practical_contributions: 为物流企业提供了优化服务的具体方向，如强化基本需求和吸引因素，减少对无关因素的投入。

title: A Systematic Review of the Performance Effects of Digital Transformation Adoption in Small and Medium-Sized Enterprises
affiliations: Universiti Utara Malaysia, Universiti Utara Malaysia and Universiti Utara Malaysia

detail.title: A Systematic Review of the Performance Effects of Digital Transformation Adoption in Small and Medium-Sized Enterprises
detail.abstract: The present article set out to analyse the existing literature on SME performance towards the impacts of digital transformation. A systematic review of the Scopus, Sage Journals, and Emerald Insight yielded 28 relevant studies, as determined by the PRISMA Statement (Preferred Reporting Items for Systematic Reviews and Meta-Analyses) guidelines. Further review of these articles resulted in four main themes, i.e., digital capability, digital strategy, digital technology, and digital leadership. Several recommendations are highlighted related to conducting more qualitative studies, having specific and standard systematic review methods for guiding research synthesis in the context of digital transformation adoption impact and practising complementary searching techniques such as citation tracking, reference searching, and contacting experts. By referring to this, SLR can encourage policymakers to consider digitalisation proposals in the performance development planning of SMEs and, at the same time, formulate adaptation strategies that are in line with the Rancangan Malaysia Kedua Belas (RMKe-12) from 2021 to 2025.

AI.tldr: 本文通过系统综述分析了数字转型对中小企业绩效影响的现有文献，提出了四个主题，并建议未来研究方向和政策制定参考。
AI.research_question: 数字转型对中小企业绩效的影响是什么？
AI.motivation: 探讨数字转型对中小企业绩效的影响，为政策制定提供依据。
AI.theoretical_framework: 数字能力、数字战略、数字技术和数字领导力。
AI.method: 基于PRISMA指南的系统综述，分析了28篇相关文献。
AI.findings: 总结了数字转型对中小企业绩效影响的四个主题。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了数字转型与中小企业绩效关系的理论框架。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了数字转型在中小企业绩效发展中的参考建议。

title: Information and Communication Technology (ICT) Learning Tools in Transforming Basic Education Curriculum in Nigeria: The Case Study of the Calabar Education Zone of Cross River State
affiliations: University of Calabar, Calabar, Nigeria, University of Calabar, Calabar, Nigeria, University of Calabar, Calabar, Nigeria, University of Calabar, Calabar, Nigeria and University of Calabar, Calabar, Nigeria

detail.title: Information and Communication Technology (ICT) Learning Tools in Transforming Basic Education Curriculum in Nigeria: The Case Study of the Calabar Education Zone of Cross River State
detail.abstract: The study investigates Information and Communication Technology (ICT) learning tools in transforming Basic Education Curriculum in Nigeria: a Case Study of the Calabar Education Zone of Cross River State. The study was guided by three (3) research questions while three (3) hypotheses were formulated and tested at 0.05 level of significance. The design of the study was Ex-post facto survey. The sample of study consisted of one hundred (100) pupils through simple random techniques. The instrument for data collection was researchers" developed Information and Communication Technology Learning Tools Questionnaire (ICTLTQ). The instrument was validated by experts in Educational Foundations Department, University of Calabar. Data collected were analysed using Analysis of Covariance (ANCOVA). The result of the analysis shows that Google Form, WhatsApp and Microsoft Solver learning tools had significant impact on transforming Basic Education Curriculum in the study area. Based on the findings, it was recommended among others that ICT learning tools should be integrated in Basic Education Curriculum in order to improve students" digital literacy skills and general academic performance.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了信息与通信技术（ICT）学习工具在尼日利亚基础教育课程转型中的作用，以克罗斯河州卡拉巴尔教育区为例。研究发现Google Form、WhatsApp和Microsoft Solver等工具对课程转型有显著影响，建议将其纳入基础教育课程以提高学生的数字素养和学术表现。
AI.research_question: 信息与通信技术（ICT）学习工具如何影响尼日利亚基础教育课程的转型？
AI.motivation: 研究旨在探索ICT工具在提升基础教育质量和学生数字素养方面的潜力。
AI.theoretical_framework: 研究基于ICT在教育中的应用理论，探讨其对课程转型的影响。
AI.method: 采用事后调查设计，通过简单随机抽样选取100名学生，使用自编问卷（ICTLTQ）收集数据，并通过协方差分析（ANCOVA）处理数据。
AI.findings: Google Form、WhatsApp和Microsoft Solver等ICT学习工具对基础教育课程转型有显著影响。
AI.theory_contributions: 研究验证了ICT工具在教育转型中的理论作用，为相关研究提供了实证支持。
AI.practical_contributions: 建议将ICT工具纳入基础教育课程，以提升学生的数字素养和学术表现。
