title: The Economic Gains from Breaking Boundaries: Reformulating Index Insurance Zones to Maximize Lower Tail Dependence
affiliations: Universidad Politécnica de Madrid, University of California, Davis, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid and Universidad Carlos III de Madrid

detail.title: The Economic Gains from Breaking Boundaries: Reformulating Index Insurance Zones to Maximize Lower Tail Dependence
detail.abstract: Index insurance intended to help low-wealth households manage risk is hampered by downside basis risk, meaning that the insured suffers a loss, but the insurance index fails to signal a loss. Existing index insurance contracts use statistically ad hoc administrative boundaries to demarcate insurance zones. We develop an algorithm that creates zones that maximize lower tail dependence amongst individual units included in each zone. Breaking boundaries in this way minimizes basis risk. Using data from a satellite-based index insurance program in Kenya, we show that replacing administrative with optimized zones can as much as triple the value of insurance using an expected utility-based metric of insurance quality.

title: The Challenges of Modernizing G2p Payments: Reaching the Last-Mile in Financial Inclusion
affiliations: Inter-American Development Bank, University of Wisconsin-Madison, Inter-American Development Bank and Inter-American Development Bank

detail.title: The Challenges of Modernizing G2p Payments: Reaching the Last-Mile in Financial Inclusion
detail.abstract: We experimentally study the impacts of providing phone-based assistance to open digital bank accounts and sign up for direct deposits to beneficiaries of a Colombian cash transfer program who continued to receive transfers in cash despite having the option to adopt direct deposits. The intervention increased the probability of receiving transfers via direct deposit by 7.3 percentage points, generating savings for the government and increasing the timely reception of transfers. Difficulties that the government faced in reaching these individuals and their high costs of adopting digital technologies contribute to the low take-up. Beneficiaries without a prior financial history were less responsive to the intervention, but had larger impacts on transfer delivery and access. For this subgroup, the intervention improved access to formal credit markets. These findings highlight the potential benefits and challenges of reaching the last mile of financial inclusion.

AI.tldr: 本文通过实验研究了为哥伦比亚现金转移计划的受益人提供电话辅助服务对其开通数字银行账户和直接存款的影响。干预措施使直接存款接收概率提高了7.3个百分点，为政府节省了成本并提高了转移支付的及时性。研究发现，政府难以触达这些群体及其采用数字技术的高成本是低采纳率的主要原因。无金融历史的受益人对干预反应较弱，但在转移支付和金融准入方面影响更大。
AI.research_question: 提供电话辅助服务如何影响哥伦比亚现金转移计划受益人开通数字银行账户和直接存款的采纳率？
AI.motivation: 尽管受益人可以选择直接存款，但许多人仍继续以现金形式接收转移支付。研究旨在探索如何通过干预措施提高数字金融服务的采纳率。
AI.theoretical_framework: 金融包容性理论、行为经济学（采纳障碍）。
AI.method: 实验研究，通过电话辅助干预措施。
AI.findings: 干预使直接存款采纳率提高7.3个百分点，节省政府成本并提高转移支付的及时性。无金融历史的受益人在金融准入方面获益更多。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了金融包容性中“最后一英里”的挑战和潜在解决方案。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政府提供了通过电话辅助提高数字金融服务采纳率的可行方案。

title: Reducing Predatory Loans and Fostering Financial Inclusion: An Impact Evaluation of a Micro-Lending Program
affiliations: Universidad EAFIT - School of Economics and Finance - Center for Research in Economic & Finance (CIEF), State University of New York (SUNY) at Binghamton - Department of Economics, Universidad EAFIT - School of Economics and Finance - Center for Research in Economic & Finance (CIEF), Universidad del Pacifico and affiliation not provided to SSRN

detail.title: Reducing Predatory Loans and Fostering Financial Inclusion: An Impact Evaluation of a Micro-Lending Program
detail.abstract: Underbanked communities in some Latin American countries often rely on ”drop-by-drop” loans,characterized by small, frequent repayments with high interest rates from informal lenders. This studyexamines how group lending and financial education affect the reliance on these loans through a state-supported microloan program for low-income families in Medellin, Colombia. Using propensity scorematching to analyze survey data, we find a 58% reduction in predatory loan applications and a 14 per-centage point decrease in overall demand. The program also increased financial stability, with a 55%increase in the probability of saving and a 30% improvement in food security perceptions. Financial lit-eracy among the participants increased by 27%, and their subjective assessment of household economicconditions improved by 30%. These outcomes are mainly attributed to the program’s combination ofgroup lending and financial education.

AI.tldr: 研究探讨了团体贷款和金融教育如何通过政府支持的小额贷款计划减少拉丁美洲未充分银行化社区对高利贷的依赖。结果显示，该计划显著降低了高利贷需求，提升了金融稳定性和家庭经济状况。
AI.research_question: 团体贷款和金融教育如何影响拉丁美洲未充分银行化社区对高利贷的依赖？
AI.motivation: 未充分银行化社区依赖高利贷导致高利息负担和金融不稳定，研究旨在探索替代方案。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于小额贷款和金融教育的理论，探讨其对金融行为和经济状况的影响。
AI.method: 使用倾向得分匹配法分析哥伦比亚麦德林低收入家庭的调查数据。
AI.findings: 高利贷申请减少58%，整体需求下降14个百分点；储蓄概率提高55%，食品安全感提升30%。
AI.theory_contributions: 验证了团体贷款和金融教育结合对改善金融行为的有效性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了减少高利贷依赖、提升金融稳定的可行方案。

title: Altruistic Behavior and Government Interventions in Times of Crisis
affiliations: University of Mannheim - Department of Economics, Leibniz  Universität Hannover and Leibniz University Hannover

detail.title: Altruistic Behavior and Government Interventions in Times of Crisis
detail.abstract: We analyze the response of charitable donations to restrictions on civil liberties. We argue that, theoretically, restrictions can both increase altruistic behavior by raising the perceived benefit of donations, and decrease it by imposing utility losses on the donor. Using data on donations in Norwegian grocery stores to estimate the effect empirically, we find that overall, donation rates increase significantly following the implementation of local restrictions. We provide evidence that this rise is likely driven by individuals not directly affected by the restrictions. Thus, the effect of government restrictions on altruistic behavior depends strongly on how these restrictions affect the donating individual and potential recipients.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了公民自由限制对慈善捐赠的影响，发现限制措施总体上会显著提高捐赠率，尤其是未直接受限制的个体。
AI.research_question: 公民自由限制如何影响慈善捐赠行为？
AI.motivation: 探讨限制措施对捐赠行为的理论影响，并实证检验其实际效果。
AI.theoretical_framework: 限制可能通过提高捐赠的感知收益增加捐赠，或通过效用损失减少捐赠。
AI.method: 利用挪威超市的捐赠数据进行实证分析。
AI.findings: 限制措施实施后，捐赠率显著上升，主要由未直接受影响的个体驱动。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了限制对捐赠行为的双重理论机制。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了关于限制措施对捐赠行为影响的实证依据。

title: Declining Business Dynamism and Worker Mobility
affiliations: Bureau of Economic Analysis

detail.title: Declining Business Dynamism and Worker Mobility
detail.abstract: Younger workers tend to sort into younger firms, suggesting that the decline in U.S. business dynamism differentially affected labor market outcomes over the worker life cycle. In this paper, I develop an equilibrium labor market sorting model with both on-the-job search and two-sided, life-cycle heterogeneity to quantify the career consequences of firm aging. I find that it accounts for about 45 percent of the decline in the employer switching rate and about 15 percent of the decline in the employmentto-population ratio since the 1990s. Total welfare of employed workers declines by about 0.9 percent and younger workers experience larger losses.

AI.tldr: 年轻员工倾向于加入年轻公司，美国商业活力的下降对员工生命周期中的劳动力市场结果产生了差异影响。本文通过建立均衡劳动力市场排序模型，量化了公司老龄化对职业生涯的影响，发现其解释了约45%的雇主转换率下降和15%的就业人口比例下降。
AI.research_question: 公司老龄化如何影响员工的职业生涯？
AI.motivation: 研究美国商业活力下降对劳动力市场的差异化影响，尤其是年轻员工和年轻公司的匹配关系。
AI.theoretical_framework: 均衡劳动力市场排序模型，包含在职搜索和双向生命周期异质性。
AI.method: 建立并分析均衡劳动力市场排序模型，量化公司老龄化的影响。
AI.findings: 公司老龄化解释了约45%的雇主转换率下降和15%的就业人口比例下降，员工总福利下降约0.9%，年轻员工损失更大。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出了包含生命周期异质性的均衡劳动力市场排序模型，为公司老龄化对职业生涯的影响提供了理论解释。
AI.practical_contributions: 揭示了公司老龄化对劳动力市场的实际影响，为政策制定者提供了改善年轻员工就业环境的依据。

title: Unready: The State of Preparedness of Current and Future Caregivers
affiliations: TIAA Institute and TIAA Institute

detail.title: Unready: The State of Preparedness of Current and Future Caregivers

declarations.declarationOfInterest: All findings, interpretations, and conclusions of this paper represent the views of the authors and does not represent official views of the above-named institutions. © 2025 Pension Research Council of the Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania. All rights reserved.

publicationDetails.detailsText: Wharton Pension Research Council Working Paper No. 15
publicationDetails.journalName: Wharton Pension Research Council / Boettner Center Working Paper Series

detail.abstract: By 2030, one in five US residents will be age 65+, and 70 percent of them are expected to need caregiving and long-term care (LTC) during their lifetimes. With Medicaid financing some LTC for low-income individuals and private LTC insurance paying less than 3% of total LTC, the rest of these costs are borne by individuals. Nevertheless, there is limited research on how individuals prepare for future caregiving. To better understand how prepared US adults are to become caregivers, we conducted a survey of both caregivers and non-caregiving adults to understand how individuals plan or anticipate providing care for elders. We find that adults who anticipate becoming caregivers understand some elements of what caregiving will require of them, but they also underestimate many of the negative impacts caregiving can have, from financial to healthrelated, and spend little time planning or preparing for caregiving.

AI.tldr: 到2030年，美国20%的居民将超过65岁，其中70%预计需要护理和长期照护（LTC）。由于低收入人群的LTC部分由医疗补助支付，而私人LTC保险仅覆盖不到3%的费用，其余费用由个人承担。然而，关于个人如何为未来护理做准备的研究有限。本文通过调查护理者和非护理者，探讨美国成年人对成为护理者的准备情况。研究发现，预期成为护理者的人虽然了解部分护理需求，但低估了护理对财务和健康的负面影响，且很少为护理做准备。
AI.research_question: 美国成年人对成为护理者的准备情况如何？
AI.motivation: 随着老龄化加剧，护理需求增加，但个人对护理的财务和健康影响准备不足，亟需研究。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于护理经济学和行为经济学理论，探讨个人对护理需求的认知与准备行为。
AI.method: 通过问卷调查护理者和非护理者，分析其对护理的预期和准备情况。
AI.findings: 预期成为护理者的人部分了解护理需求，但低估负面影响，且缺乏准备。
AI.theory_contributions: 填补了个人护理准备行为的研究空白，扩展了护理经济学和行为经济学的应用。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者和个人提供护理准备的参考，强调提前规划和教育的必要性。

title: (Deep) Learning to Trade: An Experimental Analysis of AI Trading and Market Outcomes
affiliations: Luiss Guido Carli University, Frankfurt School of Finance & Management and Luiss Guido Carli University

detail.title: (Deep) Learning to Trade: An Experimental Analysis of AI Trading and Market Outcomes
detail.abstract: We investigate how AI-driven investors, modeled via deep reinforcement learning, operate in a calibrated financial market with realistic return predictability and endogenous price impact. We examine whether these agents can learn to detect and exploit return predictability from public signals, decode prices to infer latent demand, and adjust for price impact. To evaluate performance, we compare AI traders to a rational benchmark representing the optimal policy under full knowledge of the data generating process. In simulations, AI traders qualitatively match the benchmark. Quantitatively, however, they fall short when many interact. The presence of other AI traders injects noise into the price process through their exploration, distorting the portfolio-return signals each agent learns from and thus impairing learning. This negative learning externality reduces trading profits, lowering market efficiency and liquidity relative to the benchmark. Our findings suggest caution when extrapolating from partial-equilibrium analyses of AI trading's profitability and impact on market quality.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了基于深度强化学习的AI投资者在具有现实回报可预测性和内生价格影响的金融市场中的行为。研究发现，AI交易者在与其他AI交易者互动时会因学习外部性而降低市场效率和流动性。
AI.research_question: AI驱动的投资者能否在具有现实回报可预测性和内生价格影响的金融市场中有效学习和交易？
AI.motivation: 探讨AI交易者在复杂市场环境中的表现及其对市场质量和效率的影响。
AI.theoretical_framework: 深度强化学习、金融市场微观结构理论。
AI.method: 通过模拟实验，将AI交易者与完全了解数据生成过程的理性基准进行比较。
AI.findings: AI交易者在定性上与基准匹配，但在与其他AI交易者互动时因学习外部性而表现不佳，降低了市场效率和流动性。
AI.theory_contributions: 揭示了AI交易者在多代理环境中的学习外部性及其对市场效率的影响。
AI.practical_contributions: 提醒在评估AI交易盈利能力和市场质量影响时需谨慎，避免从局部均衡分析中过度推断。

title: Correcting Inventorship: a Patent Law Mechanism to Support Female Inventors
affiliations: Nottingham Law School

detail.title: Correcting Inventorship: a Patent Law Mechanism to Support Female Inventors
detail.abstract: This research addresses the gender gap with a focus on patenting and female inventors. In this regard it is important to distinguish between gender policies which have become increasingly political and the black letter IPR laws which are a different factor. Challenges inherent in procedures to correct inventorship which differ across jurisdictions contribute to this disparity. In addition, many patents are filed in more than one jurisdiction. The research offers a unique legal perspective to enhance female participation in acquiring IPRs through a comparative law study of the law regarding correcting inventorship and rectifying the patent register when necessary to ensure their contribution as an inventor is expressly acknowledged ('mentioned').  Inventorship should always reflect who actually devised the invention, regardless of gender and any potential implications for patent ownership. The inventorship recordal provided by the applicant is presumed to be correct until specifically challenged. As such, women will have to be proactive in asserting their inventorship rights which is administratively challenging and another barrier to overcome. The comparative law methodology involving the top five innovating nations according to the Global Innovation Index 2024 reveals different procedures and identifies key themes in relation to the legal requirements related to post-application and post-grant applications to correct inventorship.

AI.tldr: 本研究探讨了专利与女性发明者之间的性别差距，通过比较法研究提出法律视角以提升女性在知识产权获取中的参与度。
AI.research_question: 如何通过法律手段减少专利发明者性别差距，并确保女性发明者的贡献被明确承认？
AI.motivation: 性别政策与知识产权法律之间的差异，以及跨司法管辖区纠正发明者身份的复杂程序，加剧了性别差距。
AI.theoretical_framework: 比较法研究，聚焦于全球创新指数前五国家的法律程序。
AI.method: 采用比较法方法论，分析不同司法管辖区纠正发明者身份的法律要求。
AI.findings: 研究发现，女性需主动主张发明者权利，但程序复杂且存在行政障碍。
AI.theory_contributions: 为性别与知识产权法律研究提供了新的法律视角。
AI.practical_contributions: 提出改进法律程序以促进女性发明者参与的建议。

title: Quantifying the Financial Burden of Heat-Related Hospital Admissions in Switzerland under a Changing Climate: A Scalable Analytical Framework
affiliations: University of Zurich, University of Zurich, Columbia University, University of Zurich, University of Basel, University of Zurich, University of Zurich and University of Zurich

detail.title: Quantifying the Financial Burden of Heat-Related Hospital Admissions in Switzerland under a Changing Climate: A Scalable Analytical Framework

declarations.declarationOfInterest: NA
declarations.funderStatement: This paper has received funding from the Swiss National Science Foundation (SNSF) under the project ''How sustainable is sustainable finance? Impact evaluation and automated greenwashing detection'' (Grant Agreement No. 100018\_207800), and from project ''Impact costs of climate change in Switzerland'', under the NCCS-Impacts program of the National Center for Climate Services.

detail.abstract: Background: While heat-related mortality is well-documented, the full economic burden of non-fatal illness remains underexplored. This gap hinders evidence-based health planning in a warming climate. We aimed to quantify the current and projected financial burden of heat-related hospital admissions in Switzerland. Methods: We linked daily hospital admissions (1998–2022) from six major Swiss cantons, representing 60% of the national total, to temperature records using a Distributed Lag Non-Linear Model (DLNM) meta-analysis. Costs were estimated via the Swiss Diagnosis-Related Groups (SwissDRG) tariff system across different disease categories and age groups. Future climate projections were generated using CH2018 climate simulations with Shared Socioeconomic Pathway scenarios (SSP1-RCP2.6, SSP2- RCP4.5, SSP5-RCP8.5). Findings: Historically, extreme heat significantly increased hospital admissions in major Swiss regions, with endocrine/metabolic disorders showing the highest risk (Relative Risk 2.02). The elderly (75+) and children were the most vulnerable populations. The average annual cost of these direct hospitalizations across the six cantons studied was CHF 20.6 million (2013–2022), notably a conservative estimate representing only a fraction of the total economic burden. Future projections show this burden escalating sharply. Under a high-emissions pathway (SSP5-RCP8.5), these direct costs are projected to increase 2.5-fold by the 2060s, with costs for the elderly quintupling. Critically, even with aggressive mitigation (SSP1-RCP2.6), costs are still projected to triple compared to the baseline. This is driven primarily by demographic aging, with climate change acting as a significant amplifier, responsible for 15–30% of the projected cost increases for the elderly. Interpretation: Our findings from major Swiss regions reveal a substantial and growing financial burden on the healthcare system. Given that these figures represent a lower bound, the true costs are likely much higher. This evidence underscores the urgent need for nationally coordinated adaptation policies to protect public health and ensure healthcare sustainability, even as mitigation efforts continue.

AI.tldr: 研究量化了瑞士当前及未来因高温相关住院的直接经济负担，发现老年人和儿童最易受影响，且未来成本将显著增加，需国家协调适应政策。
AI.research_question: 瑞士高温相关住院的直接经济负担当前及未来如何变化？
AI.motivation: 高温相关非致命疾病的经济负担未被充分研究，阻碍了气候变暖背景下的健康规划。
AI.theoretical_framework: 基于瑞士诊断相关组（SwissDRG）收费系统和气候模型（CH2018）。
AI.method: 使用分布式滞后非线性模型（DLNM）将住院数据与温度记录关联，结合不同社会经济路径（SSP）和气候情景（RCP）进行未来预测。
AI.findings: 极端高温显著增加住院风险，内分泌/代谢疾病风险最高（RR 2.02）；当前年均成本为2060万瑞郎，未来可能增长2.5倍（高排放情景）。
AI.theory_contributions: 量化了高温对医疗系统的经济负担，揭示了人口老龄化和气候变化的叠加效应。
AI.practical_contributions: 为政策制定者提供了适应气候变化的紧迫性证据，强调需协调国家政策以保障医疗可持续性。

title: Data Uncertainty in Financial Information
affiliations: The University of Hong Kong - Faculty of Business and Economics and University of Maryland - Robert H. Smith School of Business

detail.title: Data Uncertainty in Financial Information
detail.abstract: We develop a Bayesian tensor model that addresses three fundamental data challenges in empirical asset pricing: missing observations, infrequent measurements, and inherent noise in financial information. The model combines two ingredients: multiple imputations of firm characteristics and tensor representations jointly modeling time-series and cross-sectional dependencies in the high-dimensional panel. Our method outperforms traditional approaches, delivering higher prediction accuracy and valid confidence intervals for firm characteristic data. Imputing missing and infrequently updated data, although having negligible impacts on factor tangency portfolios, reduces the number of statistically significant alphas in characteristic-managed portfolios. Imputation of all characteristics, including the observed ones, can be used as synthetic data to perform pseudo out-of-sample tests for cross-sectional asset pricing models.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种贝叶斯张量模型，用于解决实证资产定价中的三个数据挑战：缺失观测、低频测量和金融信息中的固有噪声。模型结合了多重填补和联合建模时间序列与横截面依赖的张量表示，显著优于传统方法。
AI.research_question: 如何解决实证资产定价中缺失观测、低频测量和噪声数据的问题？
AI.motivation: 传统方法在处理高维面板数据时难以应对缺失、低频和噪声问题，需要更有效的建模方法。
AI.theoretical_framework: 贝叶斯张量模型，结合多重填补和张量表示。
AI.method: 开发贝叶斯张量模型，联合建模时间序列与横截面依赖，填补缺失数据。
AI.findings: 模型预测精度更高，提供有效置信区间；填补数据对因子组合影响小，但减少显著alpha数量。
AI.theory_contributions: 提出贝叶斯张量模型，填补了高维金融数据建模的理论空白。
AI.practical_contributions: 为资产定价模型提供合成数据，支持伪样本外测试，提升实证研究可靠性。

title: Coping with Geopolitical Tensions through Stronger Economic Resilience
affiliations: Ateneo de Manila University - Ateneo School of Government

detail.title: Coping with Geopolitical Tensions through Stronger Economic Resilience

keywords: US Trade Policy and Global Spillovers

detail.abstract: The America First policy of the Trump 2.0 administration has become a source of geopolitical tension. Friction and unease have extended from the US-China rivalry and now involve traditional allies of the US. As a result, political and economic discourse about the possibility of decoupling has expanded to geoeconomic fragmentation. Among the possible outcomes of geoeconomic fragmentation is financial instability, a salient example of which is the recent increase in yields of US government bonds in response to the uncertainty spawned by the mercurial rollout of US tariffs. Asian economies can reduce their vulnerability to financial instability by strengthening their economic resilience. This can be achieved by improving their domestic financial institutions and deepening regional financial integration. Regional financial cooperation can support both of these objectives. An example is reinforcing the Chiang Mai Initiative Multilateralization Stability Facility. Meanwhile, the Regional Comprehensive Economic Partnership provides a ready-made platform for its members’ political leaders to protect and project their multilateral interests.

AI.tldr: 本文探讨了特朗普2.0政府的“美国优先”政策引发的地缘政治紧张及其对金融稳定的影响，提出亚洲经济体可通过加强经济韧性和区域金融合作来应对。
AI.research_question: “美国优先”政策如何导致地缘经济分裂，以及亚洲经济体如何通过加强经济韧性和区域金融合作来应对金融不稳定？
AI.motivation: 特朗普2.0政府的“美国优先”政策加剧了地缘政治紧张，尤其是美中竞争及其对传统盟友的影响，引发了地缘经济分裂和金融不稳定。
AI.theoretical_framework: 地缘经济分裂理论、金融不稳定理论、区域金融合作理论。
AI.method: 通过分析政策影响和金融市场反应，提出亚洲经济体的应对策略。
AI.findings: 亚洲经济体可通过加强国内金融机构和深化区域金融整合来减少金融不稳定的风险，区域金融合作（如清迈倡议多边化稳定机制）是有效途径。
AI.theory_contributions: 丰富了地缘经济分裂与金融不稳定关系的理论，强调了区域金融合作的重要性。
AI.practical_contributions: 为亚洲经济体提供了应对金融不稳定的具体策略，如利用《区域全面经济伙伴关系协定》平台推动多边利益。
